text.1539: [03] ^b^pusa posane^eb^. posati. poso.  kammacittautuaahiaarehi posiyatiiti ^b^poso^eb^. ``a~n~nepi devo  posetii''ti dassanato pana ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.nepi ima.m dhaatu.m vakkhaama.
text.154: [03] ^b^ukha nakha makha rakha lakha rakhi lakhi ikhi rikhi  gatyatthaa^eb^. ukhati. nakhati. makhati. rakhati. lakhati.  ra"nkhati. la"nkhati. i"nkhati. ri"nkhati.
text.1540: [03] ^b^pisu silisu pusu palusu usu upadaahe^eb^. pesati.  silesati. sileso. posati. palosati. osati. usu.
text.1543: [03] ^b^hasa^eb^ ^a^M0.0175^ea^ ^b^hasane^eb^. hasati. assaa hasanti,  aajaaniiyaa hasanti, pahasati, uhasati. kaarite ``haaseti''iccaadi,  uhasiyamaano, haaso, pahaaso, hasana.m, pahasana.m, hasita.m.  ^b^ha^eb^kaaralopena mandahasana.m ``sita''nti vuccati ``sita.m  paatvaakaasii''tiaadiisu.
text.1544: [03] tattha ^b^uhasatii^eb^ti avahasati. ^b^udasiyamaano^eb^ti  avahasiyamaano. tatraaya.m paa.li ``idha bhikkhu.m ara~n~nagata.m vaa  rukkhamuulagata.m vaa su~n~naagaaragata.m vaa maatugaamo upasa"nkamitvaa uhasati''  iti ca ``so maatugaamena uhasiyamaano'' iti ca. ^b^haaso^eb^ti  hasana.m vaa somanassa.m vaa ``haaso me upapajjathaa''tiaadiisu viya.
text.1545: [03] ^b^tusa hasa hisa rasa sadde^eb^. tusati, hasati, hisati,  rasati, rasita.m. atraaya.m paa.li ``bheriyo sabbaa vajjantu, vii.naa  sabbaa rasantu taa'' iti.
text.155: [03] ^b^rakkha paalane^eb^. rakkhati. rakkhaa, rakkha.na.m, siila.m  rakkhito devadatto, siila.m rakkhita.m devadattena, siila.m rakkhako devadatto.
text.1552: [03] tattha ^b^rasatibbayo^eb^ti so so vayo rasati parihaayati, na  va.d.dhatiiti attho.
text.1553: [03] ^b^lasa silesanakii.lanesu^eb^. lasati. laaso. lasii ca  te nippalitaa. ^b^lasi^eb^ vuccati matthalu"nga.m. ^b^nippalitaa^eb^ti  nikkhantaa.
text.1555: [03] ^b^misa masa sadde rose ca^eb^. mesati. masati. meso.  masako.
text.1558: [03] ^b^sa.msa thutiya~nca. ca^eb^kaaro hi.msaapekkhaaya. sa.msati,  pasa.msati. pasa.msaa, pasa.msanaa. pasattho bhagavaa. pasa.msamaano,  pasa.msito, pasa.msako, pasa.msitabbo, pasa.msaniiyo, paasa.mso, pasa.msitvaa  iccaadiini.
text.1559: [03] ^b^disa pekkhane^eb^. etissaa pana naanaaruupaani bhavanti --  ``dissati padissati'' iccaadi ^b^akammaka.m^eb^. ``passati  dakkhati''iccaadi ^b^sakammaka.m^eb^.
text.1560: [03] dissatu, passatu, dakkhatu. disseyya, passeyya, dakkheyya.  disse, passe, dakkhe. dissa, passa, dakkha. adissaa, apassaa.  addaa siidantare nage. addakkhaa, addakkhu.m, adassu.m. adassi,  apassi, adakkhi.
text.1561: [03] dassissati, passissati, dakkhissati. adassissaa,  apassissaa, dakkhissaa. eva.m vattamaanapa~ncamiyaadivasena  vitthaaretabbaani. ^b^kaarite^eb^ ``dasseti dassayatii''ti ruupaani.  kamme ``passiyati'' iccaadiini.
text.1562: [03] disaa. passo. passa.m. passitaa. dassetaa. dassana.m.  vipassanaa, ~naa.nadassananti naamikapadaani. tadatthe pana tumatthe ca  ``dakkhitaaye''ti ruupa.m. ``aagataamha ima.m dhammasamaya.m, dakkhitaaye  aparaajitasa"ngha''nti hi paa.li. imasmi.m pana paa.lippadese  ``dakkhitaaye''ti ida.m tadatthe tumatthe vaa catutthiyaa ruupa.m. tathaa  ^a^M0.0177^ea^ hi ^b^dakkhitaaye^eb^ti imassa dassanatthaayaati vaa  passitunti vaa attho yojetabbo. ^b^disaa^eb^tiaadiisu pana  puratthimaadibhedaapi disaati vuccati. yathaaha --
text.1569: [22] puttadaaraa disaa pacchaa, mittaamaccaa ca uttaraa.
text.1571: [22] etaa disaa namasseyya, alamatto kule gihii''ti.
text.1572: [03] paccayadaayakaapi. yathaaha -- ``agaarino annadapaanavatthadaa,  avhaayikaa nampi disa.m vadantii''ti.
text.1576: [03] eva.m ^b^disaa^eb^saddena vuccamaana.m attharuupa.m ~natvaa idaanissa  nibbacanameva.m da.t.thabba.m. dissati candaava.t.tanaadivasena ``aya.m purimaa  aya.m pacchimaa''tiaadinaa naanappakaarato pa~n~naayatiiti ^b^disaa,^eb^  puratthimadisaadayo. tathaa ``ime amhaaka.m garu.t.thaana'ntiaadinaa  passitabbaati ^b^disaa,^eb^ maataapitaadayo. dissanti sakaaya  pu~n~nakriyaaya ime daayakaati pa~n~naayantiiti ^b^disaa,^eb^ paccayadaayakaa.  dissati uppaadavayaabhaavena niccadhammattaa sabbakaalampi vijjatiiti  ^b^disaa,^eb^ nibbaana.m. ^b^passo^eb^ti kaara.naakaara.na.m ^a^M0.0178^ea^  passatiiti passo. eva.m passatiiti ^b^passa.m^eb^. atraaya.m paa.li --
text.1579: [03] passatiiti ^b^passitaa^eb^. dassetiiti ^b^dassitaa.  dassana^eb^nti dassanakriyaa. apica ^b^dassana^eb^nti cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m.  ta~nhi ruupaaramma.na.m passatiiti dassananti vuccati. tathaa  ``dassanena pahaatabbaa dhammaa''ti vacanato ^b^dassana.m^eb^ naama  sotaapattimaggo. kasmaa sotaapattimaggo dassana.m? pa.thama.m  nibbaanadassanato. nanu gotrabhuu pa.thamatara.m passatiiti? no na  passati, disvaa kattabbakicca.m pana na karoti sa.myojanaana.m appahaanato,  tasmaa ``passatii''ti na vattabbo. yattha katthaci raajaana.m disvaapi  pa.n.naakaara.m datvaa kiccanipphattiyaa adi.t.thattaa ajjaapi raajaana.m na  passaamiiti vadanto gaamavaasii nidassana.m.
text.158: [03]b^nakkha gatiya.mb^. nakkhati. nakkhatta.m. ettha  ^b^nakkhatta^eb^nti etto ito caati visamagatiyaa agantvaa attano  viithiyaava gamanena nakkhana.m gamana.m taayati rakkhatiiti nakkhatta.m.  poraa.naa pana ``nakkharanti na nassantiiti ^b^nakkhattaanii''^eb^ti  kathayi.msu. ``nakkhatta.m, joti, nirikkha.m, bha.m'' iccete pariyaayaa.
text.1580: [03] ^b^vipassanaa^eb^ti aniccaadivasena khandhaana.m vipassanaka.m ~naa.na.m.  ^b^~naa.nadassana^eb^nti dibbacakkhupi vipassanaapi maggopi phalampi  paccavekkha.na~naa.nampi sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nampi vuccati. ``appamatto  samaano ~naa.nadassana.m aaraadhetii''ti ettha hi dibbacakkhu ~naa.nadassana.m  naama. ``~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaametii''ti  ettha vipassanaa~naa.na.m. ``abhabbaa te ~naa.nadassanaaya anuttaraaya  sambodhaayaa''ti ettha maggo, ``ayama~n~no uttarimanussadhammo  alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti ettha  phala~naa.na.m. ``~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi, akuppaa me  cetovimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti ettha  paccavekkha.na~naa.na.m. ``~naa.na~nca ^a^M0.0179^ea^ pana me dassana.m udapaadi  sattaahakaala"nkato aa.laaro kaalaamo''ti ettha sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m.  ettheta.m bhavati --
text.1584: [03] ^b^da.msa da.msane^eb^. da.msati, vida.msati. danto. kaarite  aaloka.m vida.mseti.
text.1586: [03] ^b^sa.msa kathane^eb^. sa.msati. yo me sa.mse mahaanaaga.m.
text.1588: [03] ettha baadhana.t.thena raagaadayopi ``kilesaa''ti vuccanti dukkhampi.  etesu dukkhavasena --
text.1593: [03] ettha ca ^b^vasaa^eb^ naama viliinasineho. saa va.n.nato  naa.likeratelava.n.naa. aacaame aasittatelava.n.naatipi vattu.m va.t.tati.
text.1595: [03] ^b^bhaasabyattaaya.m vaacaaya.m^eb^. bhaasati. bhaasaa, bhaasita.m, bhaataa.  paribhaasati. paribhaasaa, paribhaasako.
text.1596: [03] tatra ^a^M0.0180^ea^ bhaasanti attha.m etaayaati ^b^bhaasaa,^eb^  maagadhabhaasaadi. ^b^bhaasita^eb^nti vacana.m. vacanattho hi  ^b^bhaasita^eb^saddo nicca.m napu.msakali"ngo da.t.thabbo. yathaa ``sutvaa  luddassa bhaasita''nti. vaaccali"ngo pana ^b^bhaasita^eb^saddo tili"ngo  da.t.thabbo. yathaa ``bhaasito dhammo, bhaasita.m catusacca.m, bhaasitaa  vaacaa''ti. pubbe bhaasatiiti ^b^bhaataa,^eb^ je.t.thabhaataati vutta.m hoti.  so hi pubbe jaatattaa eva.m vattu.mlabhati. ki~ncaapi ^b^bhaatu^eb^saddo  ``bhaatikasata.m, sattabhaataro. bhaatara.m kena dosena, dujjaasi  dakarakkhino''tiaadiisu je.t.thakani.t.thabhaatuusu vattati, tathaapi yebhuyyena  je.t.thake niruu.t.tho, ``bhaataa''ti hi vutte je.t.thabhaataati vi~n~naayati, tasmaa  katthaci .thaane ``kani.t.thabhaataa''ti visesetvaa vutta.m.
text.1597: [03] nanu ca bho katthaci ``je.t.thabhaataa''ti visesetvaa vuttanti?  sacca.m, ta.m pana ^b^bhaataa^eb^saddassa kani.t.thepi vattanato paaka.tiikara.nattha.m  ``je.t.thabhaataa''ti vutta.m. yathaa hi hari.nesu vattamaanassa  ^b^miga^eb^saddassa kadaaci avasesacatuppadesupi vattanato  ``hari.namigo''ti visesetvaa vaaca.m bhaasanti, eva.m sampadamida.m  veditabba.m. yathaa ca gohatthimahi.msaacchasuukarasasabi.laaraadiisu  saama~n~navasena ^b^miga^eb^sadde vattamaanepi ``migacamma.m migama.msa''nti  aagata.t.thaane ``hari.nassaa''ti visesanasadda.m vinaapi ``hari.namigacamma.m  hari.namigama.msa''nti visesatthaadhigamo hoti, ettha na gohatthiaadiina.m  camma.m vaa ma.msa.m vaa vi~n~naayati. tathaa ``migama.msa.m khaadantii''ti  vacanassa gohatthiaadiina.m ma.msa.m khaadantiiti attho na sambhavati,  evameva katthaci vinaapi ^b^je.t.thaka^eb^iti visesanasadda.m ``bhaataa''ti  vutteyeva ``je.t.thakabhaataa''ti attho vi~n~naayatiiti. nanu ca bho  ``migacamma.m, migama.msa''nti ettha ^b^cammama.msa^eb^saddeheva ^a^M0.0181^ea^  visesatthaadhigamo hotiiti? na hoti, ^b^miga^eb^saddassa iva  ^b^cammama.msa^eb^saddaana.m saama~n~navasena vattanato, eva~nca sati kena  visesatthaadhigamo hotiiti ce? lokasa"nketavasena, tathaa hi  ^b^miga^eb^sadde ca ^b^camma^eb^saddaadiisu ca saama~n~navasena vattamaanesupi  lokasa"nketena paricchinnattaa gohatthiaadiina.m cammaadiini na ~naayanti  lokena, atha kho hari.nacammaadiiniyeva ~naayanti. ``sa"nketavacana.m  sacca.m, lokasammuti kaara.na''nti hi vuttanti da.t.thabba.m.
text.16: [03] tatra ^b^itaaya^eb^nti iti ayanti chedo. ^b^iti^eb^iti ca  gacchati pavattatiiti attho. aya.m panettha suttapadattho -- yo  ^a^M0.0003^ea^ doso loke ``kodho''ti lokiyamahaajanena vuccati,  naaya.m atthato kodhoti vattabbo. kinti pana vattabbo, eso hi  sariirasa"nkhaataguhaasayo maccuraajaa eva kodhavasena pamaddanto  sattasantaane gacchatiiti vattabbo. ta.m evaruupa.m ``maccuraajaa''ti  vattabba.m bahuno janassa anatthakara.m kodha.m hitakaamo damena pa~n~naaya  viiriyena di.t.thiyaa ca chindeyyaati.
text.1600: [03] ^b^jesu nesu esu hesu gatiya.m^eb^. jesati. nesati.  esati. hesati. dhaatvantassa pana sa~n~nogavasena ``jessati,  nessatii''tiaadiinipi gahetabbaani. jessamaano. jessa.m, jessanto.  ettha ca --
text.1605: [03] ^b^kaasa saddakucchaaya.m^eb^. kaasati, ukkaasati. kaaso.  kaasa.m saasa.m dara.m balya.m, khii.namedho nigacchati.
text.1606: [03] ^b^kaasu bhaasu dittiya.m. dittii^eb^ti paaka.tataa, viraajanataa  vaa. kaasati, pakaasati. pakaasati tejo. duure santo pakaasenti.  bhaasati. pabhaasati mida.m byamha.m. pakaaso. kaasu obhaaso.
text.1607: [03] tatra ^a^M0.0182^ea^ pakaasatiiti ^b^pakaaso,^eb^ paaka.to hotiiti attho.  tucchabhaavena pu~njabhaavena vaa kaasati pakaasati paaka.taa hotiiti  ^b^kaasu^eb^. ``kaasu'' iti aavaa.topi vuccati raasipi.
text.1609: [22] pu.t.tho me samma akkhaahi, ki.mkaasuyaa karissasii''ti
text.1610: [07] ettha hi aavaa.to kaasu naama. ``a"ngaarakaasu.m apare  phu.nanti, naraa rudantaa parida.d.dhagattaa''ti ettha raasi. kaarite --  pakaasetiiti pakaasako. obhaasetiiti obhaasako. kamme  pakaasiyatiiti pakaasito. eva.m bhaasito. bhaave -- kaasanaa.  sa"nkaasanaa. pakaasanaa. ^b^tu^eb^mantaaditte ``pakaasitu.m, pakaasetu.m,  obhaasitu.m, obhaasetu.m. pakaasitvaa, pakaasetvaa, obhaasitvaa,  obhaasetvaa''ti ruupaani bhavanti. taddhite bhaasu etassa atthiiti  bhaasuro, pabhassaro yo koci. bhaasuroti vaa kesarasiiho. imasmi.m  atthe ^b^bhaasu^eb^saddo ^b^``raaja dittiya''^eb^nti ettha  ^b^raaja^eb^saddo viya viraajanavaacako siyaa, tasmaa ruupasiriyaa  viraajanasampannataaya bhaasu viraajanataa etassa atthiiti  ^b^bhaasuro^eb^ti nibbacana.m ~neyya.m.
text.1611: [03] ^b^naasu raasu sadde^eb^. naasati. raasati. naasaa,  naasikaa.
text.1612: [03] tatra ^b^naasaa^eb^ti hatthiso.n.daapi naasaati vuccati ``sace ma.m  naaganaasuuruu, olokeyya pabhaavatii''tiaadiisu viya. manussaadiina.m  naasikaapi naasaati vuccati ``yo te hatthe ca paade ca, ka.n.nanaasa~nca  chedayii''tiaadiisu viya. naasanti abyattasadda.m karonti etaayaati  naasaa. naasaa eva ^b^naasikaa^eb^. yattha nibbacana.m na vadaama,  tattha ta.m suvi~n~neyyattaa appasiddhattaa ^a^M0.0183^ea^ vaa na vuttanti da.t.thabba.m,  avuttampi payogavicakkha.nehi upaparikkhitvaa yojetabba.m. atrida.m  vuccati --
text.1618: [03] ^b^bhisi bhaye^eb^. bhi.msati. bhi.msanako. tadaasi ya.m  bhi.msanaka.m. bhesmaakaayo.
text.1619: [03] ^b^aasisi icchaaya.m. aa^eb^pubbo ^b^sisi^eb^ icchaaya.m  vattati. aasisati. aasisateva puriso. aasisanaa.  aasisatta.m. aasisanto, aasisamaano, aasamaano.  ``suggatimaasamaanaa''ti paa.li ettha nidassana.m.
text.1621: [03] ^b^ghusii kantikara.ne. ii^eb^kaarantoya.m, tena ito na  niggahiitaagamo. ghusati.
text.1625: [03] ^b^kusa avhaane rodane ca^eb^. kosati, pakkosati.  pakkosako, pakkosito, pakkosana.m.
text.1626: [03] ^b^kassa gatiya.m^eb^. kassati, parikassati. pa.tikassati.  muulaaya pa.tikasseyya. ^b^pa.tikasseyyaa^eb^ti aaka.d.dheyya,  muulaapattiya.myeva pati.t.thaapeyyaati attho.
text.163: [03] ^b^kakhi vakhi makhi ka"nkhaaya.m^eb^. satthari ka"nkhati.  va"nkhati, ma"nkhati. ``ka"nkhaa ka"nkhaayanaa ka"nkhaayitatta.m vimati  vicikicchaa dve.lhaka.m dvedhaapatho sa.msayo aneka.msagaaho aasappanaa  parisappanaa apariyogaahanaa thambhitatta.m cittassa manovilekho'' iccete  ka"nkhaapariyaayaa. etesu pana --
text.1633: [03] ^b^lasa kantiya.m^eb^. lasati, abhilasati, vilasati.  laaso, vilaaso, vilasana.m.
text.1636: [03] ^b^tisa tittiya.m. titti^eb^ tappana.m paripu.n.nataa suhitataa.  tisati. titti.
text.1637: [03] ^b^vasa nivaase^eb^. vasati, vasiyati, vacchati. vatthu,  vattha.m, parivaaso, nivaaso, aavaaso, upavaaso, uposatho, vippavaaso,  cirappavaasii, cirappavuttho, vasitvaa, vattu.m, vasitu.m iccaadiini.
text.1638: [03] atra ^b^upavaaso^eb^ti annena vajjito vaaso upavaaso.  ^b^uposatho^eb^ti upavasanti etthaati uposatho, upavasanti siilena  vaa anasanena vaa upetaa hutvaa vasantiiti attho. aya.m panettha  atthuddhaaro -- ``aayaamaavuso kappina uposatha.m gamissaamaa''tiaadiisu  paatimokkhuddeso ^a^M0.0185^ea^ uposatho. ``eva.m a.t.tha"ngasamannaagato kho  visaakhe uposatho upavuttho''tiaadiisu siila.m. ``suddhassa ve sadaa  phaggu, suddhassuposatho sadaa''tiaadiisu upavaaso. ``uposatho naama  naagaraajaa''tiaadiisu pa~n~natti. ``na bhikkhave tadahuposathe  sabhikkhukaa aavaasaa''tiaadiisu upavasitabbadivasoti.
text.1641: [03] ^b^sasa paa.nane^eb^. sasati. satova assasati, satova  passasati. saso, sasana.m. assaaso passaaso assasanto  passasanto.
text.1643: [03] ettha ^b^atthii^eb^ti aakhyaatapada.m. na atthi khiiraa braahma.nii.  atthitaa, atthibhaavo, ``ya.m ki~nci ratana.m atthii''tiaadiisu viya  nipaatapada.m. tasmaa ^b^atthii^eb^ti pada.m aakhyaatanipaatavasena  duvidhanti veditabba.m. ^b^asa^eb^iti avibhattika.m naamikapada.m. ettha  ca ``asasmiiti hotii''ti paa.li nidassana.m. tattha ^b^atthii^eb^ti  asa, niccasseta.m adhivacana.m. iminaa sassatadi.t.thi vuttaa.
text.1644: [03] tatraaya.m padamaalaa -- ``atthi, santi. asi, attha.  asmi, asma, amhi, amha'' iccetaani pasiddhaani. ``atthu, santu.  aahi, attha. asmi, asma amhi, amha'' iccetaani ca,  ``siyaa, assa, siyu.m, assu, siya.msu. assa, assatha. siya.m,  assa, assaama'' iccetaani ca pasiddhaani.
text.1645: [03] ettha pana ``tesa~nca kho bhikkhave samaggaana.m  sammodamaanaana.m...pe0... siya.msu dve bhikkhuu abhidhamme naanaavaadaa''ti  paa.li nidassana.m ^a^M0.0186^ea^. tattha ^b^siya.msuu^eb^ti bhaveyyu.m.  ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ti visi.t.the dhamme.
text.1646: [03] idaani ^b^siyaa^eb^saddassa atthuddhaaro pabhedo ca vuccate.  ^b^siyaa^eb^ti eka.mse ca vikappane ca ``pathaviidhaatu siyaa  ajjhattikaa, siyaa baahiraa''ti eka.mse. ``siyaa a~n~natarassa  bhikkhuno aapattiviitikkamo''ti vikappane.
text.1647: [03] ^b^siyaa^eb^ti ekamaarakhyaatapada.m, ekamabyayapada.m. aakhyaatatte  ekavacananta.m, abyayatte yathaapaavacana.m. ``puttaa matthi dhanaa  matthii''ti ettha atthiiti abyayapadamiva ekavacanantampi  bahuvacanantampi bhavati. tassaakhyaatatte payogoviditova. abyayatte  pana ``sukha.m na sukhasahagata.m, siyaa piitisahagata''nti ``ime dhammaa  siyaa parittaaramma.naa''ti ca ekavacanabahuvacanappayogaa veditabbaa.  ettha dhaatuyaa kicca.m natthi. parokkhaaya.m ``itiha asa itiha  asaa''ti dassanato ^b^asa^eb^ iti pada.m gahetabba.m. hiyyattaniiruupaani  appasiddhaani. ajjataniyaa pana ``aasi, aasi.msu, aasu.m. aasi,  aasittha. aasi.m, aasimhaa'' iccetaani pasiddhaani. bhavissantiyaa  ``bhavissati, bhavissanti'' iccaadiini. kaalaatipattiyaa  ``abhavissaa, abhavissa.msu'' iccaadiini bhavanti.
text.1648: [03] ^b^saasa anusi.t.thiya.m^eb^. saasati, anusaasati. kammanta.m vo  saasati, saasana.m, anusaasana.m, anusaasanii, anusi.t.thi, satthaa, sattha.m,  anusaasako, anusaasikaa.
text.1649: [03] tatra ^b^saasana^eb^nti adhisiilaadisikkhattayasa"ngahitasaasana.m,  pariyattipa.tipattipa.tivedhasa"nkhaata.m vaa saasana.m. ta~nhi saasati etena,  ettha vaati ``saasana''nti pavuccati. apica ^b^saasana^eb^nti  ``ra~n~no ^a^M0.0187^ea^ saasana.m pesetii''tiaadiisu viya paapetabbavacana.m.  tathaa saasananti ovaado, yo ``anusaasanii''ti ca,  ``anusi.t.thii''ti ca vuccati. ^b^satthaa^eb^ti tividhayaanamukhena  sadevaka.m loka.m saasatiiti satthaa, di.t.thadhammikasamparaayikaparamatthehi  yathaaraha.m satte anusaasatiiti attho. ^b^sattha^eb^nti sadde ca atthe ca  saasati aacikkhati etenaati sattha.m. ki.mta.m? byaakara.na.m.
text.1650: [03] ^b^iisa issariye. issariya.m^eb^ issarabhaavo. iisati.  va"ngiiso, janapadeso, manujeso.
text.1651: [03] tatra ^b^va"ngiiso^eb^ti vaacaaya iiso issaroti va"ngiiso. ko  so? aayasmaa va"ngiiso arahaa. aaha ca sayameva --
text.1654: [03] ^b^aasa upavesane. upavesana.m^eb^ nisiidana.m ``aasane upavi.t.tho  sa"ngho''ti ettha viya. aasati. acchati. aasiino. aasana.m.  upaasati. upaasako.
text.1655: [03] tattha ^b^aasana^eb^nti aasati nisiidati etthaati aasana.m, ya.m  ki~nci nisiidanayogga.m ma~ncapii.thaadi.
text.1656: [03] ^b^kasii gatisosanesu. ii^eb^kaarantoya.m dhaatu, tenito na  niggahiitaagamo. kasati.
text.1658: [03] ^b^disii appiitiya.m^eb^. dhamma.m dessati. diso. di.t.tho.  dessii. desso. dessiyo.
text.1659: [03] tatra ^b^diso^eb^ti ca ^b^di.t.tho^eb^ti ca  paccaamittassaadhivacanameta.m. so hi pare dessati nappiyaayati, parehi  vaa dessiyati piyo ^a^M0.0188^ea^ na kariyatiiti ``diso''ti ca  ``di.t.tho''ti ca vuccati. atha vaa ^b^diso^eb^ti coro  vaapaccaamitto vaa. ^b^di.t.tho^eb^ti paccaamittoyeva. atrime payogaa  --
text.166: [03] ^b^kakhi iccaaya.m^eb^. dhana.m ka"nkhati, abhika"nkhati,  naabhika"nkhaami mara.na.m. abhika"nkhita.m dhana.m.
text.1660: [21] ``diso disa.m ya.m ta.m kayiraa, verii vaa pana verina.m.
text.1661: [22] micchaapa.nihita.m citta.m, paapiyo na.m tato kare''ti ca..
text.1662: [03]  ``disaa hi me dhammakatha.m su.nantuu''ti ca, ``disaa hi me te  manusse bhajantu ye dhammamevaadapayanti santo''ti ca,
text.1664: [22] sacca.m dhammo dhiti caago, di.t.tha.m so ativattatii''ti ca..
text.1665: [03]  ^b^dessii^eb^ti dessanasiilo appiyaayanasiiloti dessii.  ``dhammakaamo bhava.m hoti, dhammadessii paraabhavo''ti idamettha  payoganidassana.m. ^b^desso^eb^ti appiyo, tathaa dessiyoti. ettha  ca --
text.1666: [21] ``na me dessaa ubho puttaa, maddiidevii na dessiyaa.
text.1667: [22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa piye adaasaha''nti ca,
text.1668: [03] ``na me saa braahma.nii dessaa, napi me bala.m na vijjatii''ti  ca,
text.1669: [21] ``maataa pitaa na me dessaa, napi dessa.m mahaayasa.m.
text.1670: [22] sabba~n~nuta.m piya.m mayha.m, tasmaa vatamadhi.t.thahi''nti ca
text.1671: [07] payogaa. sabbattha ^b^me^eb^ti ca ^b^mayha^eb^nti ca  saamivacana.m da.t.thabba.m.
text.1673: [21] ``paccamitto ripu di.t.tho, diso verii ca satva'ri.
text.1674: [22] amitto ca sapatto ca, eva.m pa.n.nattikaarisuu''ti..
text.1676: [03] ^b^bhassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0189^ea^ ^b^bhassanadittiisu. bhassana.m^eb^ vacana.m.  ^b^ditti^eb^ sobhaa. bhassati. bhassa.m, pabhassara.m.
text.1678: [03] ^b^disa atisajjane^eb^. disati, upadisati, sandisati,  niddisati, paccaadisati, pa.tisandisati, uddisati. deso, uddeso  iccaadiini.
text.1681: [03] ^b^phusa samphasse^eb^. phusati. phasso, phusanaa, samphusanaa,  samphusitatta.m. evaruupo kaayasamphasso ahosi. pho.t.thabba.m, phusita.m.  devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati. phu.t.thu.m, phusitu.m, phusitvaa, phusitvaana,  phusiya, phusiyaana. phussa phussa byanti.m karoti.
text.1682: [03] tatra ^b^phasso^eb^ti aaramma.na.m phusanti etena, saya.m vaa  phusati, phusanamattameva vaa etanti phasso, aaramma.ne phusanalakkha.no  dhammo.
text.1684: [03] ettha ca ``pu.m vuccati nirayo, ta.m risatiiti ^b^puriso''^eb^ti  aacariyaa vadanti.
text.1686: [03] ^b^visa pavesane^eb^. visati, pavisati. paveso, pavesana.m,  nivesana.m, pavisa.m. ettha ^b^nivesana.m^eb^ vuccati geha.m.
text.1687: [03] ^b^masa aamasane^eb^. masati, aamasati, paraamasati.  paraamaaso, paraamasana.m.
text.1688: [03] ettha ^a^M0.0190^ea^ ^b^paraamaaso^eb^ti parato aamasatiiti paraamaaso,  aniccaadidhamme niccaadivasena ga.nhaatiiti attho. ``paraamaaso  micchaadi.t.thi kummaggo micchaapatho''tiaadiini bahuuni vevacanapadaani  abhidhammato gahetabbaani.
text.1689: [03] ^b^isu icchaaya.m^eb^. icchati, sampa.ticchati. sampa.ticchana.m,  icchaa, abhicchaa, iccha.m, icchamaano.
text.1690: [03] ^b^vesu daane^eb^. vecchati, pavecchati, paveccheti. paveccha.m,  pavecchanto.
text.1691: [03] ^b^nisa baddhaaya.m. baddhaa^eb^ti vinibaddho, aha"nkaarasseta.m  adhivacana.m. nisati.
text.1693: [03] ^b^isa pariyesane^eb^. esati. isi, i.t.tha.m, ani.t.tha.m, esa.m,  esamaano.
text.1698: [03] ^b^haa caage^eb^. jahati, vijahati. vijahana.m, jahitu.m,  jahaatave, jahitvaa, jahaaya.
text.17: [03] ^b^etii^eb^ti imassa pana aagacchatiiti attho. ``etii''ti  ettha hi ^b^aa^eb^upasaggo sandhikiccena pa.ticchannattaa na paaka.to  valaahakaavattharito pu.n.nacando viya. tathaa hi ettha aa iti etiiti  sandhiviggaho bhavati, ^b^aa^eb^kaarassa ca ^b^i^eb^kaarena parena  saddhi.myeva ^b^e^eb^kaaraadeso. tasmaa ``aya.m so saarathii eti.  etu vessantaro raajaa''tiaadiisu ``aagacchati, aagacchatuu''tiaadinaa  attho kathetabbo. byaakara.nasatthepi hi aa iti etiiti  sandhiviggaho dissati, tasmaa ayampi niiti saadhuka.m manasi  kaatabbaa. atha vaa ^b^itii^eb^ti rassavasena vutta.m pada.m gamana.m bodheti,  ^b^etii^eb^ti vuddhivasena vutta.m pana yathaapayoga.m aagamanaadiini.  mattaavasenapi hi padaani savisesatthaani bhavanti. ta.m yathaa?  saasane pabbajito, ra.t.thaa pabbaajitoti. sa~n~nogaasa~n~nogavasenapi, ta.m  yathaa? gaamaa niggacchati. yasa.m poso nigacchati, tasmaa ayampi  niiti saadhuka.m manasi kaatabbaa. ettheta.m vuccati --
text.1700: [03] tattha ^b^mhayate^eb^ti sita.m karoti. ^b^umhayate^eb^ti  paha.t.thaakaara.m dasseti. ^b^vimhayate^eb^ti vimhayana.m karoti. tatraaya.m  paa.li ``na na.m umhayate disvaa. pekkhitena mhitena ca.  mhitapubba.mva ^a^M0.0151^ea^ bhaasati. yadaa umhayamaanaa ma.m, raajaputtii  udikkhati. umhaapeyya pabhaavatii. pamhaapeyya pabhaavatii''ti.
text.1701: [03] tattha ^b^umhayamaanaa^eb^ti paha.t.thaakaara.m dassetvaa hasamaanaa.  ^b^umhaapeyyaa^eb^ti sitavasena paha.mseyya. ^b^pamhaapeyyaa^eb^ti  mahaahasitavasena parihaaseyya.
text.1703: [03] ^b^hu pasajjakara.ne. pasajjakara.na.m^eb^ pakaarena sajjanakriyaa.  havati. huto, hutavaa, hutaavii, aahuti.
text.1704: [03] ^b^huu sattaaya.m^eb^. hoti, honti. hosi, hotha. homi,  homa. pahoti, pahonti. pahuuta.m, pahuutaa, kuto pahuutaa kalahaa  vivaadaa. honto, hontaa, honta.m, pahonto. pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m.  hotu.m hotuye, pahotu.m, hutvaana. vattamaanaavibhattiruupaadiini. ettha  pasiddharuupaaneva gahitaani.
text.1705: [03] hotu, hontu. hosi, hotha. homi, homa.  pa~ncamiivibhattiruupaani. etthaapi pasiddharuupaaneva gahitaani.
text.1706: [03] huveyya, huveyyu.m. huveyyaasi, huveyyaatha. huveyyaami, huveyyaama.  huvetha, huvera.m. huvetho, huveyyaavho. huveyya.m, huveyyaamhe.  sattamiyaa ruupaani. ettha pana ``upako aajiivako `huveyya  paavuso'ti vatvaa siisa.m okampetvaa ummagga.m gahetvaa pakkamii''ti  ^b^paa.liya.m huveyyaa^eb^ti padassa dassanato nayavasena `huveyya,  huveyyu''ntiaadiini vuttaani. ^b^hupeyyaa^eb^tipi paa.tho dissati,  yathaa paccapekkha.naa. tabbasena ``hupeyya, hupeyyu.m ^a^M0.0152^ea^.  hupeyyaasii''tiaadinaa ^b^va^eb^kaarassa ^b^pa^eb^kaaraadesabhuutaani  ruupaanipi gahetabbaani.
text.1707: [03] aparo nayo -- heyya, heyyu.m. heyyaasi, heyyaatha. heyyaami,  heyyaama. hetha, hera.m. hetho, heyyaavho. heyya.m, heyyaamhe. imaani  a.t.thakathaanayena gahitaruupaani. ettha pana ``na ca uppaado hoti.  sace heyya, uppaadassaapi uppaado paapu.neyyaa''ti idampi nidassana.m  da.t.thabba.m.
text.1708: [03] huva, huvu. huve, huvittha. huva.m, huvimha. huvittha, hotha  iccapi sa~n~nogatakaaralopena ahosiiti attho. tathaahi ``kasiraa  jiivikaa hothaa''ti padassattha.m va.n.nentehi ``dukkhaa no jiivikaa  ahosii''ti attho vutto.. huvire. huvittho, huvivdo. huvi.m,  huvimhe. parokkhaaya ruupaani.
text.1709: [03] ahuvaa, ahuvuu. ahuvo, ahuvattha. ahuva.m, ahuvamha.  ahuvattha, ahuvatthu.m. ahuvase, ahuvavha.m. ahuvi.m, ahuvamhase.  hiyyattaniiruupaani.
text.171: [03] ^b^likha lekhane^eb^. likhati, sallekhati. atisallekhatevaaya.m  sama.no. lekhaa, lekhana.m, lekhako, likhita.m, sallekhapa.tipatti, etaa  ^b^dakhi^eb^aadikaa ^b^likha^eb^pariyantaa ^b^``parassabhaasaa''^eb^ti  saddasatthaviduu vadanti.
text.1710: [03] ettha ^b^ahuvamhase^eb^ti maya.m bhavamhaseti attho.  ``akaramhasa te kicca.m, ya.m bala.m ahuvamhase''ti ^b^paa.liya.m^eb^ pana  ``ahuva amhase'' iti vaa padacchedo kaatabbo ``ahu amhase''ti vaa.  pacchimanaye ^b^va^eb^kaaraagamo ``ahuvaa''ti ca ``ahuu''ti ca  dvinnampi ahosiiti attho. ^b^amha^eb^nti amhaaka.m. ^b^se^eb^ti  nipaatamatta.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- amhaaka.m ya.m bala.m ahosi, maya.m tena  balena tava kicca.m akaramhaati.
text.1711: [03] ahosi, ahu.m, ahesu.m. ahuvo, ahuvittha. ahositthaiccapi.  ahosi.m, ahuvaasi.m iccapi, ahosimhaa, ahumhaa ^a^M0.0153^ea^.  ahuvaa, ahuvu, ahuvase, ahuvivha.m. ahuva.m, ahu.m iccapi. ahuvimhe.  ajjataniyaa ruupaani.
text.1712: [03] ettha ``aha.m keva.t.tagaamasmi.m, ahu.m keva.t.tadaarako''ti dassanato  ``ahu''nti vutta.m, ahosinti attho. ``aha.m bhadante ahuvaasi.m pubbe  sumedhanaamassa jinassa saavako''ti dassanato ``ahuvaasi''nti  iccevattho. tathaa hi ^b^anekava.n.navimaanavatthua.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ imissaa  paa.liyaa attha.m va.n.nentehi ^b^ahuvaasi^eb^nti ahosinti attho  pakaasito.
text.1713: [03] ``hessati, hehissati, hehiti, hohitii''ti imaani cattaari  bhavissantiyaa maatikaapadaani veditabbaani.
text.1714: [03] idaani taani vibhajissaami -- hessaati, hessanti.  hessasi, hessatha. hessaami, hessaama. hessate, hessante.  hessase, hessavhe. hessa.m, hessaamhe. imaani ``anaagatamhi  addhaane, hessaama sammukhaa ima''nti dassanato vuttaani.
text.1718: [03] hohiti, hohinti. hohisi. sesa.m vitthaaretabba.m.  bhavissantiyaa ruupaani.
text.1719: [03] ahuvissaa, ahuvissa.msu. ahuvissase, ahuvissatha.  ahuvissa.m, ahuvissamhaa. ahuvissatha, ahuvissisu. ahuvissase  ^a^M0.0164^ea^, ahuvissavhe. ahuvissi.m, ahuvissaamhase.  kaalaatipattiruupaani.
text.172: [03] ^b^dhukkha dhikkha sandiipanakilesanajiivanesu^eb^. dhukkhati.  dhikkhati. saddasatthaviduu pana ``dhukkhate dhikkhate''ti  ^b^attanobhaasa.m^eb^ vadanti. tathaa ito paraani ruupaanipi.
text.1720: [03] ^b^vhe avhaayane baddhaaya.m sadde ca. avhaayana.m^eb^ pakkosana.m.  ^b^baddhaa^eb^ti aha"nkaaro, gha.t.tana.m vaa saarambhakara.na.m vaa. ^b^saddo^eb^  ravo. vheti, vhaayati, avheti, avhaayati, avhaasi iccapi.  kaccaayano maa.navakosmi raaja, anuunanaamo iti mavhayanti.  ^b^aa^eb^saddo upasaggova, so sa~n~nogaparattaa rasso jaato. avhito.  anavhito tato aagaa. avhaa, avhaayanaa. vaara.navhayanaa rukkhaa.  kaamavhe visaye. kumaaro candasavhayo.
text.1725: [03] ettha ^b^avhetii^eb^ti saarambhavasena attano visaya.m dassetu.m  sa"ngha.t.tatiiti attho. ``samaagate ekasata.m samagge, avhettha yakkho  avikampamaano''ti etthaapi saarambhavasena gha.t.tana.m avhaayana.m naama.
text.1728: [03] ettha pana ^b^avhaayanti varaavara^eb^nti varato vara.m nacca~nca  giita~nca karontiyo saarambha.m karontiiti attho da.t.thabbo.
text.1729: [03] ^b^pa~nha pucchaaya.m^eb^. bhikkhu garu.m pa~nha.m pa~nhati. pa~nho.  aya.m pana paa.li ``paripucchati paripa~nhati ida.m bhante katha.m imassa ko  attho''ti. ^b^pa~nha^eb^saddo pulli"ngavasena gahetabbo. ``pa~nho ma.m  ^a^M0.0165^ea^ pa.tibhaati, ta.m su.naa''ti yebhuyyena pulli"ngappayogadassanato.  katthaci pana itthili"ngopi bhavati napu.msakali"ngopi. tathaa hi  ``pa~nhaa mesaa kusalehi cintitaa. ko.n.da~n~na pa~nhaani  viyaakarohii''ti taddiipikaa paa.liyo dissanti, li"ngavipallaaso vaa  tattha da.t.thabbo.
text.173: [03] ^b^rukkha vakkha vara.ne. vara.na.m^eb^ sa.mvara.na.m. rukkhati.  vakkhati. rukkho, vakkho. ettha ca ^b^vakkho^eb^ti rukkhoyeva.  tathaa hi ``saaduuni rama.niiyaani, santi vakkhaa ara~n~najaa''ti  jaatakapaa.tho dissati. imaani pana rukkhassa naamaani --
text.1730: [03] ^b^pa~nha icchaaya.m^eb^. pa~nhati. pa~nho. ettha ca  ^b^pa~nho^eb^ti ~naatu.m icchito attho. ida.m panettha nibbacana.m  pa~nhiyati ~naatu.m icchiyati soti ^b^pa~nho^eb^ti. tathaa hi vutta.m  ``vissajjitamhi pa~nhe''ti imissaa ^b^nettipaa.liyaa^eb^ attha.m  sa.mva.n.nentena ^b^``pa~nhe^eb^ti ~naatu.m icchite atthe''ti.
text.1732: [03] tattha ^b^ummihatii^eb^ti passaava.m karoti. ^b^megho^eb^ti  mihati si~ncati loka.m vassadhaaraahiiti megho, pajjunno.  ^b^mehana^eb^nti itthiina.m guyha.t.thaana.m.
text.1733: [03] ^b^daha bhasmiikara.ne dhaara.ne ca^eb^. aagaaraani aggi dahati.  aya.m puriso ima.m itthi.m ayyika.m dahati, mama ayyikaati dhaaretiiti  attho. imassa purisassa aya.m itthii ayyikaa hotiiti adhippaayo.  atra panaaya.m paa.li ``sakyaa kho amba.t.tha raajaana.m ukkaaka.m pitaamaha.m  dahantii''ti. agginaa da.d.dha.m geha.m, dayhati, dayhamaana.m. ^b^da^eb^ssa  ^b^.daa^eb^dese ``.dahatii''ti ruupa.m. ``.dahanta.m baalamanveti,  bhasmaachannova paavako''tiaadayo payogaa ettha nidassanaani bhavanti.
text.1740: [03] ^b^araha maha puujaaya.m^eb^. arahati. araha.m, arahaa. mahati.
text.1742: [03] tatra nikkilesattaa ekantadakkhi.neyyabhaavena attano  katapuujaasakkaaraadiina.m mahapphalabhaavakara.nena araha.niiyo puujaniiyoti  ^b^arahaa,^eb^ khii.naasavo.
text.1746: [03] ettha ca ^b^ahii^eb^ti nippaadopi samaano ahati gacchati  gantu.m sakkotiiti ahi.
text.1747: [03] ^b^garaha kalaha kucchane^eb^. garahati. garahaa, kalahati,  kalaho.
text.1748: [03] ^b^varaha valaha padhaaniye paribhaasanahi.msaadaanesu ca^eb^.  varahati. valahati. varaaho.
text.1749: [03] ettha ca ^b^varaaho^eb^ti suukaropi hatthiipi vuccati. tathaa hi  ``eneyyaa ca varaahaa ca. mahaavaraahova nivaapapu.t.tho''tiaadiisu  suukaro ``varaaho''ti naamena vuccati. ``mahaavaraahassa nadiisu  jaggato, bhisa.m ghasamaanassaa''tiaadiisu pana hatthii ``varaaho''ti  naamena vuccati. ^b^mahaavaraahassaa^eb^ti hi mahaahatthinoti attho.
text.175: [27] ago nago kujo saakhii, saalo ca vi.tapii taru.
text.1750: [03] ^b^vehu jehu vaahu payatane^eb^. vehati, jehati. vaahati.  vaahano.
text.1751: [03] ^b^vaahano^eb^ ^a^M0.0197^ea^ vuccati asso. so hi vaahanti  sa"ngaamaadiisu kicce uppanne payatanti viiriya.m karonti, etenaati  ^b^vaahano^eb^ti vuccati.
text.1753: [03] ^b^uuha vitakke^eb^. uuhati, aayuuhati, viyuuhati, byuuhati  apohati. uuhana.m, aayuuhana.m, byuuho, apoho.
text.1754: [03] tattha ^b^uuhatii^eb^ti vitakketi, ^b^aayuuhatii^eb^ti vaayamati,  ^b^viyuuhatii^eb^ti pa.msu.m uddharati. eva.m ^b^byuuhatii^eb^ti etthaapi.  ^b^apohatii^eb^ti cha.d.deti, atha vaa viveceti.
text.1755: [03] ^b^gaahu vilo.lane^eb^. gaahati. gaaho, candaggaaho,  suuriyaggaaho, nakkhattaggaaho.
text.1756: [03] ^b^gaha gaha.ne^eb^. gahati, paggahati. aahuti.mpaggahissaami.  paggaho, paggaaho.
text.1758: [03] ^b^saha parisahane. parisahana.m^eb^ khanti. sahati. saho,  asaho, asayho.
text.176: [22] dumo phalii tu phalavaa, gaccho tu khuddapaadapo''ti..
text.1765: [03] ^b^liha^eb^ ^a^M0.0198^ea^ ^b^assaadane^eb^. lehati, palehati.  lehaniiya.m. atraaya.m paa.li ``sunakhaa himassa palihi.msu paade''ti.  aya.m panattho -- sunakhaa imassa kumaarassa paadatale attano jivhaaya  palihi.msuuti.
text.1769: [03] ^b^bruuha va.d.dhane^eb^. uparuupari bruuhatiiti ^b^brahmaa^eb^. kaarite  ``vivekamanubruuhetu.m va.t.tatii''ti payogo.
text.177: [03] kecettha vadeyyu.m ``nanu ca ^b^saala^eb^saddena saalarukkhoyeva  vutto, naa~n~no `saalaa phandanamaaluvaa'ti payogadassanato, atha  kimattha.m ^b^saala^eb^saddena yo koci rukkho ^a^M0.0024^ea^ vutto''ti? na  saalarukkhoyeva ^b^saala^eb^saddena vutto, atha kho saalarukkhepi  vanappatije.t.tharukkhepi yasmi.m kasmi~nci rukkhepi ``saalo''ti  vohaarassa dassanato a~n~nepi rukkhaa vuttaa. tathaa hi saalarukkhopi  ``saalo''ti vuccati. yathaaha ``seyyathaapi bhikkhave gaamassa vaa  nigamassa vaa aviduure mahanta.m saalavana.m, ta~ncassa ela.n.dehi sa~nchanna.m.  antarena yamakasaalaana''nti. vanappatije.t.tharukkhopi. yathaaha --
text.1770: [03] ^b^brahmaa^eb^ti tehi tehi gu.navisesehi bruuhitoti brahmaa.  ^b^brahmaa^eb^ti mahaabrahmaapi vuccati tathaagatopi braahma.nopi  maataapitaropi se.t.thampi. ``sahasso brahmaa dvisahasso  brahmaa''tiaadiisu hi mahaabrahmaa ``brahmaa''ti vuccati. ``brahmaati kho  bhikkhave tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana''nti ettha tathaagato.
text.1775: [03] ettha braahma.no. ``brahmaati maataapitaro, pubbaacariyaati  vuccare''ti ettha maataapitaro. ``brahmacakka.m pavattetii''ti ettha se.t.tha.m.  ettheta.m vuccati --
text.1778: [03] aparo nayo -- ^b^brahmaa^eb^ti tividhaa brahmaano sammutibrahmaano  upapattibrahmaano visuddhibrahmaanoti.
text.1780: [27] pa.tivedemi te brahme, na ne vaaretumussahe,
text.1787: [03] atha kho brahmaa sahampatii''ti ca evamaadiisu ^b^brahma^eb^saddena  upapattibrahmaa. ``brahmacakka.m pavattetii''tiaadivacanato ^b^brahma^eb^nti  ariyadhammo vuccati. tato nibbattaa avisesena sabbepi ariyaa  visuddhibrahmaano naama paramatthabrahmataaya. visesato pana ``brahmaati  kho bhikkhave tathaagatasseta.m adhivacana''nti vacanato sammaasambuddho  uttamabrahmaa naama sadevake loke brahmabhuutehi gu.nehi ukka.msapaaramippattito.  ettheta.m vuccati --
text.1790: [03] ^b^dhimha^eb^ ^a^M0.0200^ea^ ^b^ni.t.thubhane^eb^. dhimheti.  ``pa.tivaamagata.m salla.m, passa dhimhaami lohita''nti paa.li nidassana.m.
text.1798: [03] ^b^ka.la made kakkasse ca. kakkassa.m^eb^ kassasiya.m pharusabhaavo.  ka.lati.
text.18: [21] ^b^i gatiya^eb^nti kathitaa, dhaatu vuddhi.m gataa yadaa.
text.180: [03] yo koci rukkhopi. yathaaha ``atha kho ta.m bhikkhave  maaluvabiija.m a~n~natarasmi.m saalamuule nipateyyaa''ti. atrida.m vuccati --
text.1825: [03] iti ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne ^b^a^eb^vaggantadhaaturuupaani samattaani.  ettaavataa sabbaapi ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne dhaatuyo pakaasitaa.
text.1826: [03] idaani ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.nikadhaatuuna.myeva kaaci asamaanasutikaa,  kaaci asamaanantikaa. taasu kaaci samaanatthavasena samodhaanetvaa  pubbaacariyehi vuttaa, taayeva dhaatuyo ekadesena ruupavibhaavanaadiihi  saddhi.m pakaasayissaama. ta.m yathaa?
text.1827: [03] ^b^huu^eb^ ^a^M0.0202^ea^ ^b^bhuu sattaaya.m^eb^ hoti, bhavati. pahoti,  pabhavati. huveyya paavuso. sace uppaado heyya. ajesi yakkho  naraviirase.t.tha.m, tatthappanaado tumulo bahuuva. ambaa'ya.m ahuvaa pure. ahu  raajaa videhaana.m. pahuuta.m me dhana.m sakka. pahuutamariyo pakaroti pu~n~na.m.  pahuutavitto puriso. pahuutajivho bhagavaa. piyappabhuutaa kalahaa  vivaadaa. pacchaasama.nena hotabba.m. bhavitabba.m. hotu.m, hetuye, bhavitu.m.  hutvaa, hutvaana. bhavitvaa, bhavitvaana.
text.1828: [03] ettha pana ``atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkaa na  hetuye''ti paa.li nidassana.m. tattha ^b^nahetuye^eb^ti abhavitu.m.  ^b^huu^eb^dhaatuto ^b^tu.m^eb^paccayassa ^b^tave^eb^paccayassa vaa ^b^tuye^eb^  aadeso, ^b^uu^eb^kaarassa ca ^b^e^eb^kaaraadeso katoti da.t.thabba.m. atha  vaa hetubhaavaaya ^b^na^eb^ na sakkaatipi attho. aya.m panattho idha  naadhippeto, purimoyevattho adhippeto ^b^hoti^eb^ssa dhaatuno  payogabhaavaaya udaaharitapadassatthabhaavato. tattha ^b^pahotii^eb^ti ida.m  vattha.m vipulabhaavena ciivara.m kaatu.m pahoti, no nappahoti.  ^b^pahotii^eb^ti vaa puriso arayo jetu.m sakkoti. atha vaa  ^b^pahotii^eb^ti hoti. ^b^pabhavatii^eb^ti sandati. ^b^pahuuta^eb^nti  vipula.m, mahantanti attho. ^b^pahuutavitto^eb^ti vipulavitto mahaddhano.  ^b^pahuutajivho^eb^ti suputhulasudiighasumudukajivho,  ^b^piyappabhuutaa^eb^ti piyato nibbattaa.
text.1829: [03] ^b^gamu sappa gatiya.m^eb^. gacchati, gamati, ghammati,  aagacchati, uggacchati, atigacchati, pa.tigacchati, avagacchati,  adhigacchati, anugacchati, upagacchati, apagacchati, vigacchati,  nigacchati, niggacchati. a~n~naanipi yojetabbaani.  ``samuggacchatii''tiaadinaa upasaggadvayavasenapi ^a^M0.0203^ea^  yathaasambhava.m yojetabbaani. sappati, sa.msappati, parisappati.  a~n~naanipi yojetabbaani.
text.1830: [03] tattha ^b^gamatii^eb^ti gacchati. kaarite ``devadatta.m gameti  gamayatii''ti ruupaani bhavanti. ``apaaya.m gametiiti  apaayagamaniiya''nti idamettha nidassana.m. ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.na.m pattassa  ^b^aa^eb^pubbassa imassa ``aagameti, aagamayati, aagamento,  aagamayamaano''ti suddhakatturuupaani bhavanti.
text.1831: [03] tattha ^b^aagametii^eb^ti muhutta.m adhivaasetiiti attho.  ^b^ghammatii^eb^ti gacchati. ^b^aagacchatii^eb^ti aayaati.  uggacchatiib^ti uyyaati uddha.m gacchati. ^b^atigacchatii^eb^ti  atikkamitvaa gacchati. ^b^pa.tigacchatii^eb^ti puna gacchati.  ^b^avagacchatii^eb^ti jaanaati. ^b^adhigacchatii^eb^ti labhati jaanaati  vaa. ^b^anugacchatii^eb^ti pacchato gacchati. ^b^upagacchatii^eb^ti  samiipa.m gacchati. ^b^apagacchatii^eb^ti apeti. ^b^vigacchatii^eb^ti  vigamati. ^b^nigacchatii^eb^ti labhati. ``yasa.m poso  nigacchatii''ti ida.m nidassana.m. ^b^niggacchatii^eb^ti nikkhamati.  ^b^sappatii^eb^ti gacchati. ^b^sa.msappatii^eb^ti sa.msaranto gacchati.  ^b^parisappatii^eb^ti samantato gacchati.
text.1832: [03] idaani pana vi~n~nuuna.m saa.t.thakathe tepi.take buddhavacane  paramakosallajananattha.m sappayoga.m padamaala.m kathayaama. seyyathida.m? so  gacchati, te gacchanti, gacchare. tva.m gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha. aha.m  gacchaami, maya.m gacchaama. so gacchate, te gacchante. tva.m gacchase,  tumhe gacchavhe. aha.m gacche, maya.m gacchaamhe. vattamaanaaya ruupaani.
text.1833: [03] so gacchatu, te gacchantu. tva.m gacchaahi, gaccha, gacchassu,  tumhe gacchatha. aha.m gacchaami, maya.m gacchaama. so gacchata.m, te  gacchanta.m. tva.m gacchassu, tumhe gacchavho. aha.m gacche, maya.m  gacchaamase. pa~ncamiyaa ruupaani.
text.1834: [03] so ^a^M0.0204^ea^ gaccheyya, gacche, te gaccheyyu.m. tva.m  gaccheyyaasi, tumhe gaccheyyaatha. aha.m gaccheyyaami, maya.m gaccheyyaama,  gacchemu. so gacchetha, te gacchera.m. tva.m gacchetho, tumhe gaccheyyaavho.  aha.m gaccheyya.m, maya.m gaccheyyaamhe. sattamiyaa ruupaani.
text.1835: [03] so gaccha, te gacchu. tva.m gacche, tumhe gacchittha, ga~nchittha.  aha.m gaccha.m, maya.m gacchimha, ga~nchimha. so gacchittha, ga~nchittha, te  gacchire. tva.m gacchittho, tumhe gacchivho. aha.m gacchi.m, ga~nchi.m,  maya.m gacchimhe. parokkhaaya ruupaani.
text.1836: [03] so agacchaa, te agacchuu. tva.m agacche, tumhe agacchatha. aha.m  agaccha.m, maya.m agacchamhaa. so agacchatha, te agacchatthu.m. tva.m  agacchase, tumhe agacchivha.m. aha.m agaccha.m, maya.m agacchimhe.  ajjataniyaa ruupaani.
text.1837: [03] so gacchissati, te gacchissanti. tva.m gacchissasi, tumhe  gacchissatha. aha.m gacchissaami, maya.m gacchissaama. so  gacchissate, te gacchissante. tva.m gacchissase, tumhe gacchissavhe.  aha.m gacchissa.m, maya.m gacchissaamhe. bhavissantiyaa ruupaani.
text.1838: [03] so agacchissaa, te agacchissa.msu. tva.m agacchisse, tumhe  agacchissatha. aha.m agacchissa.m, maya.m agacchissaamhaa. so  agacchissatha, te agacchissisu. tva.m agacchissase, tumhe  agacchissavhe. aha.m agacchissa.m, maya.m agacchissaamhase.  kaalaatipattiyaa ruupaani.
text.1839: [03] tattha ajjataniyaa kaalaatipattiyaa ca ^b^a^eb^kaaraagama.m sabbesu  purisesu sabbesu vacanesu labbhamaanampi saasane aniyata.m hutvaa  labbhatiiti da.t.thabba.m. tathaa hi ``agacchi, gacchi, agacchissaa,  gacchissaa''tiaadinaa dve dve ruupaani dissanti. gamati, gamanti.  gamatu, gamantu. gameyya. gameyyu.m. sesa.m sabba.m vitthaaretabba.m.
text.1840: [03] idaani ^a^M0.0205^ea^ parokkhaahiyyattanajjataniisu viseso vuccate  -- so puriso magga.m ga, saa itthii ghara'maaga. te magga.m gu, taa  ghara'maagu. ^b^e^eb^kaarassa ^b^a^eb^kaaraadesa.m tva.m magga.m ga, tva.m  ghara''maaga. tumhe magga.m guttha, tumhe ghara'maaguttha. aha.m magga.m ga.m,  aha.m ghara'maaga.m. aha.m ta.m purisa.m anvaga.m, maya.m magga.m gumha, maya.m ghara.m  aagumha, maya.m ta.m purisa.m anvagumha. aya.m taava parokkhaaya viseso.
text.1841: [03] ``so magga.m agamaa, te magga.m agamuu'' iccaadi hiyyattaniyaa  ruupa.m. ``so agami, te agamu.m, te gu.m'' iccaadi ajjataniyaa ruupa.m.
text.1842: [03] idaani tesa.m padaruupaani paaka.tiikara.nattha.m ki~nci sutta.m kathayaama  -- ``sopaagaa samiti.m vana.m. athettha pa~ncamo aagaa. aagu.m devaa  yasassino. maaha.m kaakova dummedho, kaamaana.m vasamanvaga.m. agamaa  raajagaha.m buddho. va"nka.m agamu pabbata.m. braahma.naa upagacchu ma''nti  evamaadiini bhavanti.
text.1843: [21] ga gu ga guttha ga.m gumha, agu agamu agamu.m.
text.1845: [03] idaani naamikapadaani vuccante -- gato, gantaa, gaccha.m,  gacchantii, gacchanta.m kula.m, sahagata.m, gati, gamana.m, gamo, aagamo,  avagamo, gantabba.m, gamaniiya.m, gamma.m, gammamaana.m, gamiyamaana.m, go,  maatugaamo, hi"ngu, jagu, indaguu, medhago iccaadiini, kaarite --  gacchaapeti, gacchaapayati, gaccheti, gacchayati, gammeti. kamme --  gammati, gamiyati, adhigammati, adhigamiyati. ^b^tu^eb^mantaaditte  ``gantu.m, gamitu.m, gantvaa, gantvaana, gamitvaa, gamitvaana, gamiya,  gamiyaana, gamma, aagamma, aagantvaa, adhigamma, adhigantvaa''  iccaadiini ^a^M0.0206^ea^. ^b^sappa^eb^dhaatussa pana ``sappo, sappinii,  pii.thasappii, sappi'' iccaadiini ruupaani bhavanti.
text.1846: [03] tattha ^b^sahagata^eb^saddo tabbhaave voki.n.ne nissaye aaramma.ne  sa.msa.t.theti imesu atthesu dissati. tattha ``yaaya.m ta.nhaa  ponobbhavikaa nandiraagasahagataa''ti tabbhaave veditabbo,  nandiraagabhuutaati attho. ``yaaya.m bhikkhave viima.msaa kosajjasahagataa  kosajjasampayuttaa''ti voki.n.ne veditabbo, antarantaraa uppajjamaanena  kosajjena voki.n.naati ayamettha attho. ``a.t.thikasa~n~naasahagata.m  satisambojjha"nga.m bhaavetii''ti nissaye veditabbo, a.t.thikasa~n~na.m  nissaaya a.t.thikasa~n~na.m bhaavetvaa pa.tiladdhanti attho. ``laabhii hoti  ruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m aruupasahagataana.m vaa''ti aaramma.ne,  ruupaaruupaaramma.naananti attho. ``ida.m sukha.m imaaya piitiyaa sahagata.m  sahajaata.m sampayutta''nti sa.msa.t.the, imissaa piitiyaa sa.msa.t.thanti attho.  ettheta.m vuccati --
text.1849: [03] ^b^gatii^eb^ti gatigati nibbattigabhi ajjhaasayagati vibhavagati  nipphattigati ~naa.nagatiiti bahuvidhaa gati naama.
text.185: [03] ^b^sikkha vijjopaadaane^eb^. sikkhati. sikkhaa,  sikkhana.m, sikkhita.m sippa.m, sikkhako, sikkhito, sekkho,  asekkho. ^b^ka^eb^kaaralope ``sekho asekho''ti ruupaani bhavanti.  tattha ^b^sikkhito^eb^ti sa~njaatasikkho, asikkhiiti vaa  sikkhito, tathaa hi kattuppayogo dissati ``aha.m kho pana  susikkhito anavayo sake aacariyake kumbhakaarakamme''ti.
text.1850: [03] tattha ``ta.m gati.m pecca gacchaamii''ti ca ``yassa gati.m na  jaananti, devaa gandhabbamaanusaa''ti ca aya.m ^b^gatigati^eb^naama.  ``imesa.m ^a^M0.0207^ea^ kho aha.m bhikkhuuna.m siilavantaana.m neva jaanaami  gati.mvaa agati.mvaa''ti aya.m ^b^nibbattigati^eb^ naama. ``eva.m kho te  aha.m brahme gati~nca jaanaami juti~nca jaanaamii''ti aya.m b^ajjhaasayagatib^ naama. ``vibhavo gati dhammaana.m, nibbaana.m  arahato gatii''ti aya.m ^b^vibhavagati^eb^ naama. ``dve gatiyo  bhavanti ana~n~naa''ti aya.m ^b^nipphattigati^eb^ naama. ``ta.m tattha  gatimaa dhibhimaa''ti ca ``sundara.m nibbaana.m gato''ti ca aya.m  ^b^~naa.nagati^eb^ naama. ettheta.m vuccati --
text.1853: [03] gacchatiiti ^b^go^eb^. maatuyaa samabhaava.m missiibhaava~nca  gacchati paapu.naatiiti ^b^maatugaamo^eb^. roga.m hi.msanta.m gacchatiiti  ^b^hi"ngu^eb^.
text.1857: [03] ^b^jaguu^eb^ti cutito jaati.m gacchatiiti jagu. indriyena  gacchatiiti ^b^indaguu^eb^. atha vaa indabhuutena kammunaa gacchatiiti  ^b^indagu^eb^. ``hindaguu''tipi paa.li. tattha ^b^hinda^eb^nti mara.na.m.  ta.m gacchatiiti ^b^hindaguu^eb^. sabbameta.m sattaadhivacana.m, li"ngato  pulli"nga.m. ^b^medhago^eb^ti attano nissaya~nca para~nca medhamaano  hi.msamaano gacchati pavattatiiti medhago, kalaho. ``tato sammanti  medhagaa''ti ettha hi kalaho ^b^medhaga^eb^saddena bhagavataa vutto.  gamitvaati ettha --
text.1859: [22] tato vinesi bhagavaa, gantvaa gantvaa tahi.m tahi''nti
text.186: [03] ^b^bhikkha yaacane^eb^. bhikkhati. bhikkhu, bhikkhaa,  bhikkhana.m, bhikkhako, bhikkhita.m bhojana.m. ettha pana ``bhikkhu yati  sama.no muni pabbajito ^a^M0.0025^ea^ anagaaro tapassii tapodhano''  iccetaani pariyaayavacanaani. etesu saasane ``bhikkhuu''ti  upasampanno vuccati. kadaaci pana ``bhikkhusata.m bhojesi,  bhikkhusahassa.m bhojesii''tiaadiisu saama.nerepiupaadaaya ``bhikkhuu''ti  vohaaro pavattati, taapasaapi ca ^b^sama.na^eb^saddaadiihi vuccanti, ``ahuu  atiitamaddhaane, sama.no khantidiipano''tiaadi ettha nidassana.m.
text.1860: [03] aya.m ^a^M0.0208^ea^ paa.li nidassana.m. ^b^sappo^eb^ti sappatiiti  sappo, sa.msappanto gacchatiiti attho. tenaaha aayasmaa saariputto  ``yo kaame parivajjeti, sappasseva padaasiro''ti imissaa  ^b^paa.liyaa^eb^ niddese ^b^``sappo^eb^ vuccati ahi. kena.t.thena sappo?  sa.msappanto gacchatiiti ^b^sappo^eb^. bhujanto gacchatiiti  ^b^bhujago^eb^. urena gacchatiiti ^b^urago^eb^. pannasiro gacchatiiti  ^b^pannago^eb^. sariirena sappatiiti ^b^sariisapo^eb^. bile sayatiiti  ^b^bilaasayo^eb^. daa.thaa tassa aavudhoti ^b^daa.thaavudho^eb^. visa.m  tassaghoranti ^b^ghoraviso^eb^. jivhaa tassa duvidhaati  ^b^dujivho^eb^. dviihi jivhaahi rasa.m saayatiiti ^b^dvirasa~n~nuu''^eb^ti.  ^b^sappinii^eb^ti uragii. ^b^pii.thasappii^eb^ti pii.thena sappati  gacchatiiti ^b^pii.thasappii,^eb^ pa"ngu.lo. ^b^sappii^eb^ti yo na  paribhu~njati, tassa balaayuva.d.dhanattha.m sappati gacchati pavattatiiti  ^b^sappi,^eb^ ghata.m.
text.1861: [03] ^b^sakka .teka la"ngha gatyattaa^eb^. sakkati, nisakkati,  parisakkati. nisakko, parisakkana.m. .tekati. .tiikaa. la"nghati,  ulla"nghati, ola"nghati, la"nghako, ulla"nghikaa piiti.
text.1862: [03] ^bke re ge ^b^sadde^eb^. kaayati. raayati. gaayati.  jaataka.m. raa. giita.m. kaayitu.m. raayitu.m, gaayitu.m. kaayitvaa.  raayitvaa. gaayitvaa.
text.1863: [03] tattha ^b^jaataka^eb^nti jaata.m bhuuta.m atiita.m attano carita.m kaayati  katheti bhagavaa etenaati jaataka.m. jaatakapaa.li hi idha jaatakanti  vutta.m. a~n~natra pana jaata.m eva.m jaatakanti gahetabbaa. tathaa hi  ^b^jaataka^eb^saddo pariyattiyampi vattati ``itivuttaka.m jaataka.m  abbhutadhamma''ntiaadiisu, jaatiyampi vattati ``jaataka.m  samodhaanesii''tiaadiisu. ^b^raa^eb^ vuccati saddo. ^b^giita^eb^nti  gaayana.m.
text.1864: [03] ^b^khe^eb^ ^a^M0.0209^ea^ ^b^je se khaye^eb^. khaayati. jaayati.  saayati. khaya.m gacchatiiti attho.
text.1865: [03] ettha pana siyaa ``nanu ca bho ^b^khaayatii^eb^ti padassa  khaadatiiti vaa pa~n~naayatiiti vaa attho bhavati, tathaa ^b^jaayatii^eb^ti  padassa nibbattatiiti attho, ^b^saayatii^eb^ti padassa rasa.m  assaadetiiti attho, eva.m sante bho kasmaa idha eva.m attho tumhehi  kathiyatii''ti? sacca.m, dhaatuunantu anekatthattaa eva.m attho kathetu.m  labbhati. tathaa hi ``appassutaaya.m puriso, balibaddova jiiratii''ti  ettha ^b^jiiratii^eb^ti aya.m saddo jara.m paapu.naatiiti attha.m avatvaa  va.d.dhatiiti atthameva vadati, eva.m sampadamida.m da.t.thabba.m.
text.1866: [03] ^b^gu ghu ku u sadde^eb^. gavati. ghavati. kavati.  avati.
text.1867: [03] ^b^khu ru ku sadde^eb^. khoti. roti. koti.
text.1868: [03] ^b^cu ju pu plu gaa se gatiya.m^eb^. cavati. javati.  pavati. plavati. gaati. seti. cavana.m, cuti. javana.m, javo.  pavana.m, plavana.m. gaana.m. setu. poto. plavo.
text.1869: [03] ettha ^b^gaana^eb^nti gamana.m. ^b^poto^eb^ti pavati gacchati  udake etenaati poto, naavaa. tathaa plavati na siidatiiti  ^b^plavo,^eb^ naavaa eva. ``bhinnaplavo saagarasseva majjhe''ti hi  ^b^jaatakapaa.li^eb^ dissati. ``naavaa, poto, plavo, jalayaana.m,  tara.na''nti naavaabhidhaanaani.
text.187: [03] ^b^dakkha vuddhiya.m siighatte ca^eb^. dakkhati, dakkhi.naa, dakkho.  dakkhanti vaddhanti sattaa etaaya yathaadhippetaahi sampattiihi iddhaa  vuddhaa ukka.msagataa hontiiti ^b^dakkhi.naa,^eb^ daatabbavatthu. dakkhati  kusalakamme a~n~nasmi~nca kiccaakicce adandhataaya siigha.m gacchatiiti  ^b^dakkho,^eb^ cheko, yo ``kusalo''tipi vuccati.
text.1870: [03] ^b^dhe the saddasa"nghaatesu^eb^. dhaayati. thaayati. bhaave --  dhiyati, thiyati. itthii. thii.
text.1873: [03] ^b^ati adi bandhane^eb^. antati. andati. anta.m.  andu.
text.1877: [03] ^b^sala hula cala kampane^eb^. salati. hulati. calati.  kusala.m.
text.1878: [03] ettha ca kucchite paapake dhamme salayatiiti ^b^kusala.m,^eb^  hetukattuvasenida.m nibbacana.m da.t.thabba.m. tathaa hi ^b^a.t.thasaaliniya.m^eb^  ``kucchite paapake dhamme salayanti calayanti kampenti viddha.msentiiti  kusalaa''ti hetukattuvasena attho kathito. ida.m ^b^sala^eb^dhaatuvasena  ^b^kusala^eb^saddassa nibbacana.m. a~n~nesampi dhaatuuna.m vasena  ^b^kusala^eb^saddassa nibbacana.m bhavati. tathaa hi ^b^a.t.thasaaliniya.m^eb^  a~n~naanipi nibbacanaani dassitaani. katha.m? ``kucchitena vaa  aakaarena sayantiiti kusaa, te akusaladhammasa"nkhaate kuse lunanti  chindantiiti ^b^kusalaa^eb^. kucchitaana.m vaa saanato tanukara.nato  ~naa.na.m kusa.m naama, tena kusena laatabbaati ^b^kusalaa,^eb^ gahetabbaa  pavattetabbaati attho. yathaa vaa kusaa ubhayabhaagagata.m hatthappadesa.m  lunanti, evamimepi uppannaanuppannabhaavena ubhayabhaagagata.m kilesapakkha.m  lunanti, tasmaa kusaa viya lunantiitipi ^bkusalaa''ti. eva.m  a~n~naanipi nibbacanaani dassitaani. tatra ``dhammaa'' iti  padaapekkha.m katvaa tadanuruupali"ngavacanavasena ``kusalaa''ti niddeso  kato, idha pana saama~n~naniddesavasena ``kusala''nti  napu.msakekavacananiddeso amhehi kato. pu~n~navaacako hi  ^b^kusala^eb^saddo aarogyavaacako ca ekantena napu.msakali"ngo,  itaratthavaacako pana tili"ngiko, yathaa kusalo phasso, kusalaa vedanaa.  kusala.m cittanti. ^b^kusala^eb^saddo ^a^M0.0211^ea^ imasmi.m  ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne ^b^laa^eb^dhaatu^b^sala^eb^dhaatuvasena nipphatti.m gatoti  veditabbo. iti ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne samodhaanagatadhaatuyo samattaa.
text.188: [03] ^b^dikkha mu.n.diopanayananiyamabbataadesesu. dikkha^eb^dhaatu  mu.n.diye, upanayane, niyame, vate, aadese ca pavattati. dikkhati.  dikkhito mu.n.do. ettha siyaa -- nanu ca bho ^b^sarabha"ngajaatake^eb^  ``gandho isiina.m ciradikkhitaana.m, kaayaa cuto gacchati maalutenaa''ti  etasmi.m padese a.t.thakathaacariyehi ^b^``ciradikkhitaana^eb^nti  cirapabbajitaana''nti vutta.m. na hi tattha ``ciramu.n.daana''nti vutta.m.  eva.m sante kasmaa idha ^b^``dikkha^eb^dhaatu mu.n.diye vuttaa''ti?  sacca.m, tattha pana ^b^dikkhita^eb^saddassa pabbajite vattanato  ``cirapabbajitaana''nti vutta.m, na dhaatuatthassa vibhaavanattha.m. ida  pana dhaatuatthavibhaavanattha.m mu.n.diye vuttaa. taapasaa hi  mu.n.diyatthavaacakena ^b^dikkhita^eb^saddena vattu.m yuttaa. tathaa hi  a.t.thakathaacariyehi ^b^cakkavattisuttatthava.n.nanaaya.m^eb^ ``kesamassu.m  ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa''ti imissaa paa.liyaa  atthavivara.ne ``taapasapabbajja.m pabbajantaapi hi pa.thama.m kesamassu.m  ohaarenti, tato pa.t.thaaya paruu.lhakese ^a^M0.0026^ea^ bandhitvaa vivaranti, tena  vutta.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa''ti eva.m attho sa.mva.n.nito.
text.189: [03] ^b^ikkha dassana"nkesu^eb^. ikkhati, upekkhati, apekkhati.  upekkhaa, apekkhaa, paccavekkha.naa. ^b^ka^eb^kaaralope ``upekhaa,  apekhaa, upasampadaapekho''ti ruupaani bhavanti.
text.1904: [06] iti nava"nge saa.t.thakathe pi.takattaye byappathagatiisu vi~n~nuuna.m
text.191: [03] ^b^cikkha cakkha viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m^eb^. cikkhati,  aacikkhati, abbhaacikkhati. aacikkhako. cakkhati, cakkhu.  ettha ^b^cakkhuu^eb^ti cakkhatiiti cakkhu, samavisama.m abhibyatta.m vadanta.m  viya hotiiti attho. atha vaa ``suupa.m cakkhati, madhu.m  cakkhatii''tiaadiisu viya yasmaa assaadatthopi ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddo  bhavati, tasmaa ``cakkhati vi~n~naa.naadhi.t.thita.m ruupa.m assaadenta.m viya  hotii''ti assaadatthopi gahetabbo. ``cakkhu.m kho maaga.n.diya.m  ruupaaraama.m ruuparata.m ruupasammudita''nti hi vutta.m. satipi sotaadiina.m  saddaaraamataadibhaave niruu.lhattaa nayane eva ^b^cakkhu^eb^saddo pavattati  ^b^pa"nkajaa^eb^disaddaa viya padumaadiisu.
text.1913: [03] ^b^rudhi aavara.ne. rudhi^eb^dhaatu aavara.ne vattati. ettha  ^b^aavara.na.m^eb^ naama pidahana.m vaa parirundhana.m vaa palibuddhana.m vaa haritu.m  vaa appadaana.m, sabbameta.m va.t.tati. rundhati, rundhiti, rundhiiti,  rundheti, avarundheti. kammani -- maggo purisena rundhiyati.  rodho, orodho, virodho, pa.tivirodho, viruddho, pa.tiviruddho,  pariruddho. rundhitu.m, parirundhitu.m. rundhitvaa. parirundhitvaa.
text.1914: [03] tatra ^b^rodho^eb^ti caarako. so hi rundhati pavesitaana.m  kuruurakammantaana.m sattaana.m gamana.m aavaratiiti ^b^rodho^eb^ti vuccati.  ^b^orodho^eb^ti raajubbarii, saa pana yathaakaamacaara.m caritu.m appadaanena  orundhiyati avarundhiyatiiti ^b^orodho. virodho^eb^ti  ananukuulataa. ^b^pa.tivirodho^eb^ti punappuna.m ananukuulataa.  ^b^viruddho^eb^ti virodha.m aapanno. ^b^pa.tiviruddho^eb^ti pa.tisattubhaavena  ^a^M0.0213^ea^ virodha.m aapanno. ^b^pariruddho^eb^ti gaha.natthaaya  samparivaarito. vutta~nhi ``yathaa ariihi pariruddho, vijjante gamane  pathe''ti. ^b^avaruddho^eb^ti pabbaajito.
text.1915: [03] ^b^muca mocane^eb^. miga.m bandhanaa mu~ncati. mu~ncana.m, mocana.m.  dukkhappamocana.m, moco.
text.1916: [03] ^b^moco^eb^ti cettha a.t.thikakadaliirukkho. mu~ncitu.m.  mu~ncitvaa. kaarite ``moceti, mocetu.m, mocetvaa''tiaadiini.
text.1917: [03] ^b^rica virecane^eb^. ri~ncati. ri~ncana.m, virecana.m, vireko,  virecako. ri~ncitu.m. ri~ncitvaa.
text.1918: [03] ^b^sica pagghara.ne^eb^. udakena bhuumi.m si~ncati. putta.m rajje  abhisi~nci. abhiseko. muddhaabhisitto khattiyo. si~nca bhikkhu  ima.m naava.m, sittaa te lahumessati. sitta.t.thaana.m. si~ncitu.m.  si~ncitvaa.
text.1919: [03] ^b^yuja yoge^eb^. yu~njati, anuyu~njati. kammani  ``yu~njiyatii''ti ruupaani. keci ``yu~njate''ti icchanti. yu~njana.m,  sa.myogo, anuyogo, bhaavanaanuyutto, sa~n~nogo, sa~n~nojana.m, atthayojanaa.  diigha.m santassa yojana.m. yu~njitu.m, anuyu~njitu.m. anuyu~njitvaa.  yojeti. tattha ^b^sa.myojana^eb^nti bandhana.m kaamaraagaadi.  ^b^yojana^eb^nti --
text.1923: [03] ^b^bhuja paalanabyavahara.nesu. paalana.m^eb^ rakkha.na.m.  ^b^byavahara.na.m^eb^ ajjhohara.na.m. bhu~njati, paribhu~njati, sa.mbhu~njati.  daasaparibhogena paribhu~nji. kaarite ``bhojeti bhojayatii''tiaadiini  ruupaani. bhojana.m, sambhogo, mahibhujo, gaamabhojako ^a^M0.0214^ea^,  upabhogo, paribhogo. bhutto odano bhavataa. sace bhutto bhaveyyaaha.m.  odana.m bhutto bhuttavaa bhuttaavii. ^btumantaaditte ``bhu~njitu.m,  paribhu~njitu.m, bhojetu.m, bhojayitu.m, bhu~njitvaa, bhu~njitvaana, bhu~njiya,  bhu~njiyaana, bhojetvaa, bhojetvaana, bhojayitvaa, bhojayitvaana''  iccaadiini ^b^pari^eb^saddaadiihi visesitabbaani.
text.1924: [03] tatra ^b^bhu~njatii^eb^ti bhatta.m bhu~njati, bhojaniiya.m bhu~njati. tathaa  hi ``khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa khaadati vaa bhu~njati vaa''tiaadi  vutta.m. apica kadaaci khaadaniiyepi ``bhu~njatii''ti vohaaro dissati.  ``phalaani khuddakappaani, bhu~nja raaja varaavara''nti hi vutta.m.  ^b^paribhu~njatii^eb^ti ciivara.m paribhu~njati, pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njati,  gilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njati, pa.tisevatiiti vutta.m hoti.  teneva ca ^b^pa.tisevatii^eb^ti paribhu~njatiiti attho sa.mva.n.niyati.  apica ``kaame bhu~njatii''ti ca ``pa~ncakaamagu.ne paribhu~njatii''ti ca  dassanato pana ^b^bhu~njanaparibhu~njana^eb^saddaa pa.tisevanatthena katthaci  samaanatthaapi hontiiti avagantabbaa. ^b^sa.mbhu~njatii^eb^ti sambhoga.m  karoti, ekato vaasa.m karotiiti attho. ettha siyaa ``nanu ca bho  atra ^b^bhuja^eb^dhaatu paalanabyavahara.nesu vutto, so katha.m ettakesupi  atthesu vattatii''ti? vattateva, anekatthaa hi dhaatavo, te  upasaggasahaaye labhitvaapi anekatthataraava honti. ito pa.t.thaaya  ^b^tu^eb^mantaadiini ruupaani na vakkhaama. yattha pana viseso  dissati, tattha vakkhaama.
text.1926: [03] ^b^bhidi vidaara.ne^eb^. bhindati. anaagatatthe vattabbe  ``bhejjissati, bhindissatii''ti dvidhaa bhavanti ruupaani. paapake  akusale dhamme bhindatiiti ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. tenaaha --
text.1927: [21] ``na ^a^M0.0215^ea^ tena bhikkhu so hoti, yaavataa  bhikkhate pare.
text.1928: [22] visa.m dhamma.m samaadaaya, bhikkhu hoti na taavataa..
text.1931: [03]  ida~nca khii.naasava.m sandhaaya vutta.m, sekkhaputhujjanasama.naapi  yathaasambhava.m ``bhikkhuu''ti vattabbata.m paapu.nantiyeva. sa"ngha.m bhindatiiti  ^b^sa"nghabhedako^eb^. devadattena sa"ngho bhinno,. bhindiyatiiti  ^b^bhinno^eb^ti hi nibbacana.m. na te ka.t.thaani bhinnaani. bhindatiiti  ^b^bhettaa^eb^.
text.1932: [03] ^b^chidi dvedhaakara.ne^eb^. chindatiiti ^b^chedako,^eb^ eva.m chettaa.  kese chettu.m va.t.tati. chindiyatiiti ^b^chinno^eb^. chinnopi  rukkho punadeva ruuhati. ida.m pana ^b^bhidichidi^eb^dvaya.m  ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.na.m patvaa ``bhijjati chijjatii''ti suddhakattuvaacaka.m  ruupadvaya.m janeti, tasmaa ``bhijjatiiti ^b^bhinno''^eb^tiaadinaa  suddhakattuvasenapi nibbacana.m kaatabba.m.
text.1934: [03] ^b^udi pasavakiledanesu. pasavana.m^eb^ sandana.m. kiledana.mb^  tindataa. undati. unduuro, samuddo.
text.1935: [03] ^b^vida laabhe^eb^. vindati. govindo, vitti. ettha  ^b^vittii^eb^ti anubhavana.m, vedanaa vaa.
text.1936: [03] ^b^vida tu.t.thiya.m^eb^. vindati, nibbindati. nibbindana.m.  virajjati. nibbindo kaamaratiyaa. vitti, vitta.m, vedo. labhati  atthaveda.m dhammaveda.m.
text.1937: [03] ettha ^b^vittii^eb^ti somanassa.m. ``vitti hi ma.m vindati  suta disvaa''ti hi vutta.m. ^b^vitta^eb^nti vittijananattaa  vittasa"nkhaata.m dhana.m. ^b^vedo^eb^ti ^a^M0.0216^ea^ ganthopi ~naa.nampi  somanassampi vuccati. ``ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu''tiaadiisu hi gantho  ``vedo''ti vuccati. ``braahma.na.m vedagumabhija~n~naa aki~ncana.m kaamabhave  asatta''ntiaadiisu ~naa.na.m. ``ye vedajaataa vicaranti  loke''tiaadiisu somanassa.m.
text.1938: [21] vedaganthe ca ~naa.ne ca, somanasse ca vattati.
text.1943: [22] yadaa ca~n~ne vilumpanti, so vilutto vilumpatiiti..
text.1944: [03] ^b^pisa cu.n.nane^eb^. pi.msati. pisako. pisu.naa vaacaa.  ^b^aagama.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ pana ``attano piyabhaava.m parassa ca su~n~nabhaava.m  yaaya vaacaaya bhaasati, saa pisu.naa vaacaa''ti vutta.m, ta.m  niruttilakkha.nena vuttanti da.t.thabba.m.
text.1946: [21] ahi.msakoti me naama.m, hi.msakassa pure sato.
text.1947: [22] ajjaaha.m saccanaamomhi, na na.m hi.msaami ki~ncana.m..
text.1948: [03] hi.msitabba.m ki.msatiiti ^b^siiho^eb^.  aadiantakkharavipallaasavasena saddasiddhi, yathaa ``kantana.t.thena  takka''nti. vihesako, vihesana.m.
text.1949: [03] ^b^sumbha^eb^ ^a^M0.0217^ea^ ^b^pahaare^eb^. yo no gaavova  sumbhati. parisumbhati. sumbhoti. atrime paa.lito payogaa --
text.1952: [22] datvaa ca no pakkamati, bahudukkha.m anappaka''nti ca,
text.1954: [03] a~n~nattha pana a~n~naapi vuttaa. taa idha anupapattito na vuttaa.  kecettha ma~n~neyyu.m, yathaa ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.ne ^b^``saki sa"nkaaya.m  khaji gativekalle''^eb^tiaadiina.m dhaatuuna.m pa.tiladdhavaggantabhaavassa  niggahiitaagamassa vasena ``sa"nkati kha~njatii''ti ruupaani bhavanti,  tathaa imasmi.m ^b^rudhaadi^eb^ga.ne ^b^``muca mocane kati  chedane''^eb^tiaadiina.m dhaatuuna.m pa.tiladdhavaggantabhaavassa niggahiitaagamassa  vasena ``mu~ncati kantatii''tiaadiini ruupaani bhavanti. eva.m sante  ko imesa.m tesa~nca visesoti? ettha vuccate -- ye  ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.nasmi.m anekassaraa asa.myogantaa ^b^i^eb^kaarantavasena  niddi.t.thaa, te aakhyaatatta~nca naamikatta~nca patvaa suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu  ekantato niggahiitaagamena nipphannaruupaa bhavanti, na katthacipi tesa.m  vinaa niggahiitaagamena ruupappavatti dissati. ta.m yathaa? sa"nkati,  sa"nkaa, kha~njati, kha~njo iccaadi. aya.m anekassaraana.m  ^b^i^eb^kaarantavasena niddi.t.thaana.m ^b^bhuuvaadi^eb^ga.nikaana.m viseso.
text.1955: [03] ye ca ^b^rudhaadi^eb^ga.nasmi.m anekassaraa asa.myogantvaa  ^b^a^eb^kaarantavasena vaa ^b^u^eb^kaarantavasena vaa niddi.t.thaa, te  aakhyaatatta.m patvaa suddhakattuvisayeyeva ekantato niggahiitaagamena  nipphannaruupaa bhavanti, na hetukattuvisaye. naamikatta.m pana  sahaniggahiitaagamena vinaa ca niggahiitaagamena nipphannaruupaa bhavanti.  yattha ^a^M0.0218^ea^ vinaa niggahiitaagamena nipphannaruupaa, tattha  sasa.myogaruupaayeva bhavanti. ta.m yathaa? mu~ncati, mu~ncaapeti, moceti,  mocaapeti. chindaapeti. chedeti, chedaapeti. chindana.m, chedo.  mu~ncana.m, mocana.m. kantati, kantana.m, sallakatto. pi.t.thima.msaani  attano, saama.m ukkacca khaadasi iccaadiini. tattha ^b^ukkaccaa^eb^ti  ukkantitvaa, chinditvaati attho.
text.1956: [03] nanu ca bho eva.m sante aakhyaatanaamikabhaava.m patvaa  suddhakattuhetukattuvisayesu ekantato pa.tiladdhaniggahiitaagamehi ^b^saki  khaji^eb^ aadiihiyeva ^b^rudhaadi^eb^ga.nikehi bhavitabba.m, na pana  ^b^mucachidi^eb^aadiihiiti? tanna, ^b^mucachidi^eb^aadiihiyeva  ^b^rudhaadi^eb^ga.nikehi bhavitabba.m ^b^ruca^eb^dhaatuyaa samaanagatikattaa,  tathaa hi yathaa ``rundhissa, rundhayati, rundhaapeti, rundhana.m, rodho,  virodho''tiaadiisu niggahiitaagamaaniggahiitaagamavasena dvippakaaraani  ruupaani dissanti, tathaa ^b^mucachidi^eb^aadiinampiiti.
text.1957: [03] nanu ^b^kaccaayane^eb^ niggahiitaagamassa niccavidhaanattha.m  ``rudhaadito niggahiitapubba~ncaa''ti lakkha.na.m vuttanti? sacca.m, ta.m  pana kriyaapadatta.m sandhaaya vutta.m. yadi ca naamikapadattampi sandhaaya  vutta.m bhaveyya, ``virodho''tiaadiina.m dassanato ^b^vaa^eb^sadda.m  pakkhipitvaa vattabba.m siyaa, na ca ^b^vaa^eb^sadda.m pakkhipitvaa vutta.m,  tena ~naayati kriyaapadatta.myeva sandhaaya vuttanti.
text.1958: [03] nanu ca bho eva.m sante ^b^sakikhaji^eb^aadiina.m nicca.m  saniggahiitaagamakriyaapadatta.myeva sandhaaya ``rudhaadito  niggahiitapubba~ncaa''ti ida.m vuttanti sakkaa mantunti? na sakkaa,  ^b^sakikhaji^eb^aadiina.m ^b^rudha^eb^dhaatuyaa asamaanagatikattaa naamikatte  dvippakaarassa asambhavato. tathaa hi yesa.m yaa naamikatte  niggahiitaagamaaniggahiitaagamavasena dvippakaaravantataa, saa ^a^M0.0219^ea^  eva tesa.m ^b^rudhaadi^eb^ga.nabhaavassa lakkha.na.m. ta~nca  ^b^sakikhaji^eb^aadiina.m natthi. ``sa"nkaa kha~njo''tiaadinaa hi  naamatte ekoyeva pakaaro dissati saniggahiitaagamo, ^b^``kamu  padavikkhepe''^eb^iccaadiina.m pana ``kamo, kamana.m, ca"nkamo,  ca"nkamana''ntiaadinaa naamikatte dvippakaaravantataasambhavepi  niggahiitaagamassa abbhaasavisaye pavattattaa saa dvippakaaravantataa  ^b^rudhaadi^eb^ga.nabhaavassa lakkha.na.m na hoti, tasmaa abbhaasavisaye  pavatta.m niggahiitaagama.m vajjetvaa yaa dvippakaaravantataa, saayeva  ^b^rudhaadi^eb^ga.nikabhaavassa lakkha.nanti sanni.t.thaana.m kaatabba.m. aya.m  nayo atiiva sukhumo sammaa manasi kaatabbo.
text.1963: [03] ^b^divu kii.laavijigisaabyavahaarajutithutikantigatisattiisu^eb^.  ettha ca ^b^kii.laa^eb^ti la.lanaa, vihaaro vaa. ^b^la.lanaa^eb^ti ca  la.litaanubhavanavasena rama.na.m. ^b^vihaaro^eb^ iriyaapathaparivattanaadinaa  vattana.m. ^b^vijigisaa^eb^ti vijayicchaa. ^b^byavahaaro^eb^ti  vohaaro. ^b^jutii^eb^ti sobhaa. ^b^thutii^eb^ti thomanaa.  ^b^kantii^eb^ti kamaniiyataa. ^b^gatii^eb^ti gamana.m. ^b^sattii^eb^ti  saamatthiya.m. imesu atthesu ^b^divu^eb^dhaatu vattati. dibbati.  devo. devii. devataa.
text.1964: [03] ettha ^b^devo^eb^ti tividhaa devaa sammutidevaa upapattidevaa  visuddhidevaati. tesu mahaasammatakaalato pa.t.thaaya lokena ``devaa''ti  sammatattaa raajaraajakumaaraadayo ^b^sammutidevaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0220^ea^ naama.  devaloke upapannaa ^b^upapattidevaa^eb^ naama. khii.naasavaa  ^b^visuddhidevaa^eb^ naama. vuttampi ceta.m ``sammutidevaa naama raajaano  deviyo kumaaraa. upapattidevaa naama bhummadeve upaadaaya taduttaridevaa.  visuddhidevaa naama buddhapaccekabuddhakhii.naasavaa''ti.
text.1965: [03] ida.m panettha nibbacana.m -- dibbanti  kaamagu.najhaanaabhi~n~naacittissariyaadiihi kii.lanti, tesu vaa viharantiiti  ^b^devaa^eb^. dibbanti yathaabhilaasita.m visaya.m appa.tighaatena  gacchantiiti ^b^devaa^eb^. dibbanti yathicchitanipphaadane sakkontiiti  ^b^devaa^eb^. atha vaa ta.mta.mbyasananitthara.natthikehi sara.na.m paraaya.nanti  devaniiyaa abhitthavaniiyaati ^b^devaa^eb^. sobhaavisesayogena  kamaniiyaati vaa ^b^devaa^eb^.
text.1966: [03] ettha ca ^b^thutikanti^eb^ atthaa kammasaadhanavasena da.t.thabbaa,  ^b^kii.laa^eb^dayo cha atthaa kattusaadhanavasena. keci pana ``divu  kii.laavijigisaabyavahaarajutithutigatiisuu''ti pa.thanti. keci  ``gatii''ti pada.m vihaaya ``jutithutiisuu''ti pa.thanti. keci  ``thutii''ti pada.m vihaaya ``jutigatiisuu''ti pa.thanti, keci pana  ^b^divu^eb^dhaatu.m ^b^``sattithutika''^eb^ntiatthepi icchanti. tenaaha  abhidhammassa ^b^anu.tiikaakaaro ``deva^eb^saddo yathaa  kii.laavijigisaavohaarajutigatiattho, eva.m sattiabhitthavakamanatthopi  hoti dhaatusaddaana.m anekatthabhaavato''tiaadi.
text.1967: [03] ida.m pana yathaavuttesu sammutidevaadiisu pacceka.m nibbacana.m --  dibbanti kii.lanti attano visaye issariya.m karontiiti ^b^devaa,^eb^  raajaano. dibbanti kii.lanti pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi, pa.tipakkhe vaa  vijetu.m icchanti, voharanti ca lokassa yuttaayutta.m, jotanti paramaaya  sariirajutiyaa, thomiyanti tabbhaavatthikehi, kaamiyanti da.t.thu.m sotu~nca  ^a^M0.0221^ea^ sobhaavisesayogena, gacchanti ca yathicchita.t.thaana.m  appa.tihatagamanena, sakkonti ca aanubhaavasampattiyaa ta.mta.mkicca.m  nipphaadetunti ^b^devaa,^eb^ caatumahaaraajikaadayo. kii.lanti paramaaya  jhaanakii.laaya, vijetu.m icchanti pa.tipakkha.m,  paramasukhuma~naa.navisesavisaya.m attha~nca voharanti, jotanti  sabbakilesadosakalusaabhaavaa paramavisuddhaaya ~naa.najutiyaa, thomiyanti  ca vi~n~naatasabhaavehi paramanimmalagu.navisesayogato, kaamiyanti ca  anuttarapu~n~nakkhettataaya da.t.thu.m sotu.m puujitu~nca, gacchanti ca  amatamahaanibbaana.m apaccaagamaniiyaaya gatiyaa, sakkonti ca cittaacaara.m  ~natvaa te te satte hite niyojetu.m amatamahaanibbaanasukhe ca  pati.t.thaapetunti ^b^devaa,^eb^ visuddhidevaa.
text.1968: [03] ^b^deva^eb^sadd ``viddhe vigatavalaahake deve''tiaadiisu  aja.taakaase aagato. ``devo ca thoka.m thoka.m phusaayatii''tiaadiisu  meghe. ``aya~nhi deva kumaaro''tiaadiisu khattiye. ``aha.m deva  sakalajambudiipe a~n~nassa ra~n~no santike ki~nci bhaya.m na  passaamii''tiaadiisu issarapuggale. ``pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito  sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti devo ma~n~ne''tiaadiisu upapattideve.  ``devaatideva.m naradammasaarathi''ntiaadiisu visuddhideve aagato.
text.1969: [03] ^b^devii^eb^ti raajabhariyaapi devadhiitaapi ``devii''ti vuccati.  devassa bhariyaati hi devii, saapi atthato ``dibbatiiti devii''ti  vattabbaa, yathaa ``bhikkhatiiti bhikkhunii''ti. tathaa hi vutta.m  ^b^vimaanavatthua.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ ``dibbati attano pu~n~niddhiyaa kii.latiiti  devii''ti.
text.1970: [03] ^b^devataa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0222^ea^ devaputtopi brahmaapi devadhiitaapi.  ``atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya ruttiyaa  abhikkantava.n.naa''tiaadiisu hi devaputto ``devataa''ti vutto  ``devoyeva devataa''ti katvaa, tathaa ``taa devataa sattasataa u.laaraa,  brahmaa vimaanaa abhinikkhamitvaa''tiaadiisu brahmaano.

text.1980: [03] tattha ^b^khiyatii^eb^ti nivasati. ^b^yamakkhaya^eb^nti  yamanivesana.m. ^b^khiyantii^eb^ti kujjhanti hi.msanti vaa.
text.1981: [03] ^b^ghaa gandhopaadaane^eb^. ghaayatiiti ^b^ghaana.m^eb^. ghaanena gandha.m  ghaayitu.m ghaayitvaa.
text.1982: [03] ^b^ruca rocane. rocana.m^eb^ ruci. bhatta.m me ruccati.  bhattampitassa na ruccati. pabbajjaa mama ruccati. ruccitu.m, ruccitvaa.  keci pana imasmi.m ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.ne ^b^``ruca dittimhii''^eb^ti  pa.thanti. ta.m na yutta.m katthacipi dittisa"nkhaatasobhanatthavaacakassa  ^a^M0.0223^ea^ ^b^ruca^eb^dhaatuno ``ruccatii''ti ruupaabhaavato. tasmaa  eva.m sallakkhetabba.m, dittiruciina.m vaacako ^b^ruca^eb^dhaatu bhuvaadiga.niko.  tassa hi ``rocati, virocati. ekattamuparocita''nti  ruupaaniyeva bhavanti, na ``ruccatii''ti ruupa.m. ruciyaayeva vaacako  pana ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.nikopi hoti ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.nikopi. tassa hi  ^b^divaadi^eb^ga.nikakaale ``gamana.m mayha.m ruccatii''ti ruupa.m.  ^b^curaadi^eb^ga.nikakaale ``ki.m nu jaati.m na rocesii''ti ruupa.m.  ^b^aa^eb^pubbo ce aacikkhane vattati, ``aaroceti, aarocayatii''ti  ruupaani dissanti.
text.1983: [03] ^b^muca mokkhe^eb^. dukkhato muccati. saddhaaya adhimuccati.  mutti, vimutti, adhimutti, muccamaano.
text.1985: [03] ^b^oko^eb^ti udakampi aavaasopi. ``okapu.n.nehi  ciivarehii''ti ca, ``vaarijova thale khitto, okamokatamubbhato''ti  cettha payogo. ^b^uukaa^eb^ti siise nibbattakimiviseso.
text.1986: [03] ^b^ukkaa^eb^ti diipikaadayo vuccanti. ``ukkaasu  dhaariyamaanaasuu''ti hi aagata.t.thaane diipikaa ``ukkaa''ti vuccati.  ``ukka.m bandheyya, ukka.m bandhitvaa, ukkaamukha.m aalimpeyyaa''ti aagata.t.thaane  a"ngaarakapalla.m. ``kammaaraana.m yathaa ukkaa, anto jhaayati no bahii''ti  aagata.t.thaane kammaaruddhana.m. ``eva.m vipaako ukkaapaato bhavissatii''ti  aagata.t.thaane vaatavego ``ukkaa''ti vuccati. ``sa.n.daasena jaataruupa.m  ^a^M0.0224^ea^ gahetvaa ukkaamukhe pakkhipeyyaa''ti aagata.t.thaane  suva.n.nakaaraana.m muusaa ``ukkaa''ti veditabbaa. icceva.m --
text.199: [03] ^b^vagga^eb^ ^a^M0.0027^ea^ gatiya.m. vaggati. vaggo, vaggita.m.  ettha samudaayavasena vaggana.m pavattana.m ^b^vaggo. vaggita^eb^nti gamana.m.  tathaa hi ^b^naagapetavatthua.t.thakathaaya.m^eb^ ``yo so majjhe  assatariirathena catubbhi yuttena suvaggitena. amhaaka.m putto ahu  majjhimo so, amaccharii daanapatii virocatii''ti imissaa paa.liyaa  attha.m vadantehi ^b^``suvaggitenaa^eb^ti sundaragamanenaa''ti. ki~nci  bhiyyo kriyaapadampi ca di.t.tha.m ``dhunanti vagganti pavattanti  cambare''ti.
text.1990: [03] ^b^che chedane^eb^. chiyati, chiyanti. avacchita.m, avacchaata.m.  chetvaana mo.li.m varagandhavaasita.m.
text.1991: [03] ^b^saja sa"nge. sa"ngo^eb^ lagana.m. sajjati. sajjana.m,  sajjito, satto.
text.1992: [03] ^b^yuja samaadhimhi^eb^. samaadhaana.m ^b^samaadhi,^eb^  kaayakammaadiina.m sammaapayogavasena avippaki.n.nataati attho. yujjati.  yogo, yogii.
text.1995: [22] passaami vo'ha'mattaana.m, yathaa icchi.m tathaa ahu''nti
text.1996: [07] vacanato avassa.m kaatu.m yujjati upapajjatiiti  ^b^yogo^eb^ti vuccati.
text.1997: [03] ^b^ranja raage^eb^. rajjati. virajjati. rajjamaano, rajja.m,  rajjanto, raago, viraago, rajjana.m, virajjana.m, rajaniiya.m. upasaggavasena  a~n~no attho bhavati. samhaa ra.t.thaa nirajjati, attano ra.t.thaa  niggacchatiiti attho.
text.1998: [03] tattha ^b^viraago^eb^ti virajjanti ettha sa.mkilesadhammaati  viraago, nibbaana.m maggo ca.
text.1999: [03] ^b^vijii bhayacalanesu^eb^. vijjati, sa.mvijjati. sa.mvego,  sa.mvejaniiya.m. ubbijjati. ubbego, ubbiggahadayo.
text.200: [03] ^b^ragi lagi agi vagi magi igi rigi ligi tagi sagi  gamane ca. ca^eb^kaaro gatipekkhako. ra"ngati. ra"ngo. la"ngati.  la"ngo, la"ngii. a"ngati, a"ngeti. a"ngo, sama"ngii, sama"ngitaa,  a"nga.m, a"nga.na.m. va"ngati. va"ngo. ma"ngati. ma"ngo, upa"ngo, ma"ngala.m.  i"ngati. i"ngita.m. ri"ngati. ri"ngana.m. li"ngati. li"ngana.m.  ulli"ngati, ulli"ngana.m. ta"ngati. ta"ngana.m. sa"ngati. sa"ngana.m.  tattha ^b^a"nga^eb^nti yesa.m kesa~nci vatthuuna.m avayavo, sariirampi  kaara.nampi ca vuccati. ^b^a"nga.na^eb^nti katthaci kilesaa vuccanti  ``raago a"nga.na''ntiaadiisu. raagaadayo hi a"nganti etehi  ta.msama"ngipuggalaa nihiinabhaava.m gacchantiiti ^b^``a"nga.naanii''^eb^ti  vuccanti. katthaci mala.m vaa pa"nko vaa ``tasseva rajassa vaa  a"nga.nassa vaa pahaanaaya vaayamatii''tiaadiisu. a~njati makkhetiiti hi  a"nga.na.m, malaadi. katthaci tathaaruupo viva.tappadeso ``cetiya"nga.na.m,  bodhiya"nga.na''ntiaadiisu. a~njati tattha .thita.m atisundarataaya  abhibya~njetiiti hi a"nga.na.m, viva.to bhuumippadeso. icceva.m --
text.2004: [03] paa.li nidassana.m. laapa.m gocara.t.thaayinanti ca. tattha  ^b^.thaayaamii^eb^ti ti.t.thaami.
text.2005: [03] ^b^.digatiya.m^eb^. .diyati. .demaano. .dino vaa. ``ucce  saku.na .demaana, pattayaana viha"ngama. vajjesi kho tva.m vaamuuru''nti  nidassana.m.
text.2007: [03] ^b^taa paalane^eb^. taayati. aghassa taataa. so nuuna  kapa.no taato, cira.m rujjati assame. taa.na.m, paritta.m, gotta.m. tva.m  khosi upaasaka katakalyaa.no katabhiiruttaa.no.
text.2008: [03] tatra ^b^paritta^eb^nti mahaatejavantataaya samantato sattaana.m bhaya.m  upaddava.m upasagga~nca taayati rakkhatiiti paritta.m, ga.m taayatiiti  ^b^gotta.m^eb^.
text.2009: [03] ^b^nata gattavinaame. gattavinaamo^eb^ gattavikkhepo. naccati.  nacca.m. niga.n.tho naa.taputto.
text.2010: [03] ^b^daa sodhane^eb^. daayati. daana.m. anuyogadaapanattha.m.  anuyoga.m datvaa. daana.m datvaa.
text.2012: [03] ^b^daadaane^eb^. puriso daana.m daayati. ^b^aa^eb^pubbo gaha.ne.  adinna.m aadiyati. siila.m samaadiyati. kamme -- purisena daana.m  diiyati, adinna.m aadiyati. kaarite -- aadapeti, samaadapeti,  aadapayati, samaadapayati, ye dhammamevaadapayanti santo.
text.2014: [03] ettha ca ^b^paritta^eb^nti samantato kha.n.ditattaa paritta.m.  appamattaka~nhi gomayapi.n.da.m ^b^paritta^eb^nti vuccati. tasmaa  ^b^paritta^eb^nti appakassa naama.m kaamaavacarassa ca dhammassa  appesakkhattaa.
text.2015: [03] ^b^daa suddhiya.m^eb^. daayati. vodaayati. vodaana.m.  akammakoya.m dhaatu. tathaa hi ``vodaayati sujjhati etenaati  ^b^vodaana.m,^eb^ samathavipassanaa''ti ^b^nettisa.mva.n.nanaaya.m^eb^ vutta.m.
text.2017: [03] tatra diinoti parikkhii.na~naatidhanaadibhaavena dukkhito.  ^b^aadiinavo^eb^tiaadiina.m dukkha.m vaati adhigacchati etenaatiaadiinavo,  doso.
text.2019: [03] bhidi bhijjan^eb^. bhijjanadhamma.m bhijjati. bhijjatiiti bhinno.  bhijjana.m bhedo.
text.2020: [03] ^b^chidi chijjane^eb^. sutta.m chijjati. chijjatiiti chinno.  eva.m chidda.m. chijjana.m chedo.
text.2021: [03] ^b^khidi^eb^ ^a^M0.0227^ea^ ^b^diiniye^eb^. diinabhaavo  ^b^diiniya.m,^eb^ yathaa dakkhiya.m. khijjati, khinno, akhinnamati,  khedo, kheda"ngato lokahitaaya naatho.
text.2022: [03] ettha ^b^kheda"ngato^eb^ti kaayikadukkhasa"nkhaata.m parissama.m patto,  dukkhamanubhaviiti attho.
text.2023: [03] ^b^pada gatiya.m^eb^. pajjati. magga.m pa.tipajjati. pa.tipatti.m  pa.tipajjati. addhaanamaggappa.tipanno hoti, phalasamaapatti.m samaapajjati.  aapatti.m aapajjati. akammakampi bhavati, tesa.m adhammo aapajjati,  pajjo, byagghapajjo, sampadaayo.
text.2024: [03] ettha ca ^b^pajjo^eb^ti maggo. byagghapajje saddulapathe jaatoti  ^b^byagghapajjo,^eb^ eva.mnaamako kulaputto. sampadiyati ~naapiyati  dhammo etenaati ^b^sampadaayo,^eb^ akkhaataa.
text.2025: [03] ^b^vida sattaaya.m. sattaa^eb^ vijjamaanaakaaro. vijjati,  sa.mvijjati. jaatavedo, vijjaa, avijjaa, vidito.
text.2026: [03] tattha ^b^jaatavedo^eb^ti aggi. so hi jaatova vedayati  dhuumajaalu.t.thaanena pa~n~naayati, tasmaa ^b^jaatavedo^eb^ti vuccati.  ^b^vijjaa^eb^ti dhammaana.m sabhaava.m vidita.m karotiiti vijjaa, ~naa.na.m.  ^b^avijjaa^eb^ti khandhaana.m raasa.t.tha.m, aayatanaana.m aayatana.t.tha.m, dhaatuuna.m  su~n~na.t.tha.m, saccaana.m tatha.t.tha.m, indriyaana.m adhipatiya.t.tha.m avidita.m karotiiti  avijjaa. dukkhaadiina.m pii.lanaadivasena vutta.m catubbidha.m attha.m avidita.m  karotiiti ^b^avijjaa,^eb^ moho.
text.2027: [03] ^b^mada ummaade. ummaado^eb^ naama muyha na.m vaa  sativippavaaso vaa cittavikkhepo vaa. majjati, pamajjati. matto,  suraamadamatto. matto aha.m mahaaraaja. puttama.msaani khaadayi.m.  mattahatthii, pamatto, ummatto.
text.2028: [21] appamaado ^a^M0.0228^ea^ amata.m pada.m, pamaado maccuno pada.m.
text.2029: [22] appamattaa na miyyanti, ye pamattaa yathaa mataa..
text.2030: [03] ^b^mida sinehane^eb^. mejjati. mettaa, metti, mitta.m, mitto.
text.2031: [03] ^b^antaradhaa adassane. antara^eb^pubbo ^b^dhaa^eb^dhaatu  vijjamaanassa vatthuno adassane vattati. antaradhaayati.  antaradhaana.m, antaradhaayanto. saa devataa antarahitaa.  antaraapidhaayati.
text.2032: [03] ^b^budha avagamane. avagamana.m^eb^ jaanana.m. bujjhati, buddho,  buddhi, buddha.m, bodho, bodhi. bujjhitaa saccaani. sakala.m buddho,  buddhavaa, vibodheti, bodhetaa, buddho, vibuddho iccaadiini.
text.2033: [03] tatra buddhoti bujjhitaa saccaaniiti buddho, bodhetaa pajaayaati  ^b^buddho^eb^. atha vaa paaramitaaparibhaavitaaya pa~n~naaya sabbampi ~neyya.m  abujjhiiti ^b^buddho^eb^. keci pana kammenapi ^b^buddha^eb^saddassa  siddha.m icchantaa eva.m nibbacana.m karonti ``sammaasambuddho vata so  bhagavaati adhigatagu.navisesehi khii.naasavehi bujjhitabboti buddho''ti.  vitthaaro pana ^b^niddese^eb^ vuttanayena gahetabbo. buddhiiti  bujjhatiiti ^b^buddhi^eb^. eva.m ^b^buddha.m bodho bodhi^eb^ ca. atha vaa  bujjhana.m ^b^buddhi^eb^. eva.m ^b^bodho bodhi^eb^ ca, sabbameta.m  pa~n~naayaadhivacana.m.
text.2034: [03] idaani ^b^bodhi^eb^saddassa atthuddhaara.m vadaama. ^b^bodhii^eb^ti  hi rukkhopi maggopi sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nampi nibbaanampi eva.mpa.n.nattiko  puggalopi vuccati, tathaa hi ``bodhirukkhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho''ti  ca, ``antaraa ca bodhi.m antaraa ca gaya''nti ca aagata.t.thaane rukkho  bodhiiti vuccati. ``catuusu maggesu ~naa.na''nti ^a^M0.0229^ea^  aagata.t.thaane maggo. ``pappoti bodhi.m varabhuuri sumedhaso''ti  aagata.t.thaane sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.na.m. ``patvaana bodhi.m amata.m asa"nkhata''nti  aagata.t.thaane nibbaana.m. ``bodhi bhante raajakumaaro bhagavato paade  sirasaa vandatii''ti ``ariyasaavako bodhiiti vuccatii''ti ca  aagata.t.thaane eva.mpa.n.nattiko puggalo.
text.2036: [21] rukkhe magge ca nibbaane, ~naa.ne sabba~n~nutaaya ca.
text.2039: [03] ettha ca koci payogo ^b^tu^eb^mantaadiini ca ruupaani vuccante  -- ``guyhamatthamasambuddha.m, sambodhayati yo naro. para.m sambuddhumarahati.  bujjhitu.m, buddhu.m, bujjhitvaa, bujjhitvaana, bujjhituna, buddhiya,  buddhiyaana, buddhaa, buddhaana'' iti bhavanti.
text.2040: [03] tatra ^b^asambuddha^eb^nti parehi a~n~naata.m, ``asambodha''ntipi  paa.tho, paresa.m bodhetu.m ayuttanti attho. ^b^sambuddhu^eb^nti sa.mbujjhitu.m.  ^b^buddhaa^eb^ti bujjhitvaa, eva.m ^b^buddhaanaa^eb^ti etthaapi.
text.2041: [03] keci pana ^b^``naamaruupaparicchede^eb^ `bodhimaggena budhvaa'ti  ca, ``budhvaa bodhitale yamaaha sugato'ti ca  ^b^dha^eb^kaara^b^va^eb^kaarasa~n~nogavato padassa dassanato  ^b^tvaa^eb^paccayantabhaavato ca ^b^dha^eb^kaara^b^va^eb^kaarasa.myogavasena  ``budhvaa''ti padasiddhi icchitabbaa''ti vadanti, ta.m taadisassa  padaruupassa buddhavacane adassanato ca, buddhavacanassa ananukuulataaya ca,  parisuddhe ca poraa.napotthake ^a^M0.0230^ea^ ^b^va^eb^kaarasa.myogavigatassa  ``bodhimaggena buddhaa''tica, ``buddhaa bodhitale''ti ca padassa  dassanato na gahetabba.m. tathaa hi na taadiso paa.tho buddhavacanassa  anukuulo hotiiti. na hi buddhavacane vassasatampi vassasahassampi  pariyesantaa taadisa.m ^b^va^eb^kaarab^dhab^kaarasa~n~nogapada.m passissanti.  eva.m ``budhvaa''ti padaruupassa buddhavacanassa ananukuulataa da.t.thabbaa.  ta~nhi sakka.taganthe kataparicayabhaavena va~ncitehi viduuhi icchita.m, na  saddhammaniitividuuhi. ettha imaani nidassanapadaani veditabbaani --
text.2042: [03] ko ma.m viddhaa niliiyati. laddhaa macco yadicchati. laddhaana  pubbaapariya.m visesa.m, adassana.m maccuraajassa gacche.
text.2045: [03] tattha ^b^viddhaa^eb^ti vijjhitvaa. ^b^laddhaa^eb^ti labhitvaa.  ^b^laddhaanaa^eb^ti labhitvaana. ^b^di.t.thaa^eb^ti disvaa. iti ``viddhaa  laddhaa laddhaana di.t.thaa''ti padaani ^b^tvaa^eb^paccayena saddhi.m gataanipi  sa~n~nogavasena ^b^va^eb^kaarapa.tibaddhaani na honti, tasmaa ``buddhaa  buddhaana'' iccetaanipi ``laddhaa laddhaana'' iccaadiini viya  parihiina^b^va^eb^kaarasa~n~nogaani eva gahetabbaani. ye ``budhvaa''ti  ruupa.m icchanti pa.thanti ca, ma~n~ne te ^b^tvaa^eb^paccayo va~nceti, tena te  va~ncana.m paapu.nanti, tasmaa taadisa.m ruupa.m aggahetvaa yo saddaniitiya.m  saddavinicchayo vutto, soyeva aayasmantehi saarato paccetabbo.
text.2046: [03] ^b^budha bodhane^eb^. sakammakaakammakoya.m dhaatu. tathaa hi  bodhanasadduccaara.nena jaanana.m vikasana.m niddakkhayo ca gahito, tasmaa  ^b^``budha^eb^ ~naa.ne, ^b^budha^eb^ vikasane, ^b^budha^eb^ niddakkhaye''ti  vutta.m hoti. bujjhati bhagavaa, dhamme bujjhati, pabujjhati, paduma.m  bujjhati. puriso buddho, pabuddho, bodhati, pabodhati iccaadiini.
text.2047: [03] ^b^sa.mdhaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0231^ea^ ^b^sandhimhi. sa.m^eb^pubbo  ^b^dhaa^eb^dhaatu sandhimhi vattati. nevassa maddii bhaaku.ti, na  sandhiyati na rodati. ^b^na sandhiyatii^eb^ti ida.m a~n~nehi  pakara.nehi asaadhaara.na.m ^b^divaadi^eb^ruupa.m.
